resps: IQ.
's IQ
development
neurodevelopment
filtered_resps: IQ.
bleu: IQ.
Antidepresivele luate în timpul sarcinii nu afectează copilul

translation.en: Three new studies show the use of antidepressants by pregnant women does not have neurodevelopmental or behavioral effects on their children.
translation.ro: Trei studii noi atată că administrarea de antidepresive la femeile însărcinate nu are efecte asupra dezvoltării neuronale sau comportamentale a copiilor lor.

target: Trei studii noi atată că administrarea de antidepresive la femeile însărcinate nu are efecte asupra dezvoltării neuronale sau comportamentale a copiilor lor.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Three new studies show the use of antidepressants by pregnant women does not have neurodevelopmental or behavioral effects on their children.
bleu: Trei studii noi atată că administrarea de antidepresive la femeile însărcinate nu are efecte asupra dezvoltării neuronale sau comportamentale a copiilor lor.

translation.en: The studies showed that selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors, or SSRIs, carry an increased risk for postpartum bleeding, however researchers said depression poses a greater risk for women and their children, which requires it to be addressed.
translation.ro: Studiile au arătat că inhibitorii selectivi ai recaptării serotoninei (SSRI) prezintă un risc crescut al sângerării postpartum, însă cercetătorii au afirmat că depresia reprezintă un risc și mai mare pentru femei și copiii lor, de aceea trebuie tratată.

target: Studiile au arătat că inhibitorii selectivi ai recaptării serotoninei (SSRI) prezintă un risc crescut al sângerării postpartum, însă cercetătorii au afirmat că depresia reprezintă un risc și mai mare pentru femei și copiii lor, de aceea trebuie tratată.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The studies showed that selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors, or SSRIs, carry an increased risk for postpartum bleeding, however researchers said depression poses a greater risk for women and their children, which requires it to be addressed.
bleu: Studiile au arătat că inhibitorii selectivi ai recaptării serotoninei (SSRI) prezintă un risc crescut al sângerării postpartum, însă cercetătorii au afirmat că depresia reprezintă un risc și mai mare pentru femei și copiii lor, de aceea trebuie tratată.

translation.en: "These studies add to a growing body of evidence about the safety of taking antidepressants during pregnancy," John Thorp, deputy editor-in-chief of the International Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology, which published all three of the studies, said in a press release.
translation.ro: „Aceste studii se adaugă unui set tot mai mare de dovezi privitoare la siguranța administrării de antidepresive în timpul sarcinii”, a declarat într-un comunicat de presă John Thorp, editor-șef adjunct al Jurnalului Internațional de Obstetrică și Ginecologie, care a publicat toate trei studiile.

target: „Aceste studii se adaugă unui set tot mai mare de dovezi privitoare la siguranța administrării de antidepresive în timpul sarcinii”, a declarat într-un comunicat de presă John Thorp, editor-șef adjunct al Jurnalului Internațional de Obstetrică și Ginecologie, care a publicat toate trei studiile.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "These studies add to a growing body of evidence about the safety of taking antidepressants during pregnancy," John Thorp, deputy editor-in-chief of the International Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology, which published all three of the studies, said in a press release.
resps: "They help to clarify the risks and benefits of these medications when prescribed during pregnancy."
"Pregnant women should not stop taking antidepressants if they are already taking them and if they and their doctor have decided they should continue to do so."
filtered_resps: "They help to clarify the risks and benefits of these medications when prescribed during pregnancy."
bleu: "They help to clarify the risks and benefits of these medications when prescribed during pregnancy."

„Aceste studii se adaugă unui set tot mai mare de dovezi privitoare la siguranța administrării de antidepresive în timpul sarcinii”, a declarat într-un comunicat de presă John Thorp, editor-șef adjunct al Jurnalului Internațional de Obstetrică și Ginecologie, care a publicat toate trei studiile.

translation.en: While there are some increased risks, the evidence so far seems to be that the risks of untreated depression outweigh the risks of taking them.
translation.ro: Cu toate că există unele riscuri crescute, până acum dovezile par să arate că riscurile depresiei netratate sunt mai mari decât cele ridicate de administrarea antidepresivelor.

target: Cu toate că există unele riscuri crescute, până acum dovezile par să arate că riscurile depresiei netratate sunt mai mari decât cele ridicate de administrarea antidepresivelor.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: While there are some increased risks, the evidence so far seems to be that the risks of untreated depression outweigh the risks of taking them.
bleu: Cu toate că există unele riscuri crescute, până acum dovezile par să arate că riscurile depresiei netratate sunt mai mari decât cele ridicate de administrarea antidepresivelor.

translation.en: The Norwegian Institute of Public Health conducted a study on motor development of children whose mothers were treated with SSRIs by analyzing data on 51,404 children from the Norwegian Mother and Child Cohort Study, looking at the effects of SSRI use on motor skill development at age 3.
translation.ro: Institutul Norvegian pentru Sănătate Publică a coordonat un studiu privind dezvoltarea motorie a copiilor ale căror mame s-au tratat cu SSRI, analizând datele a 51 404 de copii din Studiul norvegian de cohortă al mamei și copilului, cercetând efectele utilizării SSRI pentru dezvoltarea abilității motorii la vârsta de 3 ani.

target: Institutul Norvegian pentru Sănătate Publică a coordonat un studiu privind dezvoltarea motorie a copiilor ale căror mame s-au tratat cu SSRI, analizând datele a 51 404 de copii din Studiul norvegian de cohortă al mamei și copilului, cercetând efectele utilizării SSRI pentru dezvoltarea abilității motorii la vârsta de 3 ani.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Norwegian Institute of Public Health conducted a study on motor development of children whose mothers were treated with SSRIs by analyzing data on 51,404 children from the Norwegian Mother and Child Cohort Study, looking at the effects of SSRI use on motor skill development at age 3.
resps: The study did not find any association between prenatal SSRI exposure and motor skill development in girls, but found that boys who were exposed to SSRIs prenatally scored lower on a motor skills test than unexposed boys.
The study found that children of mothers who used SSRIs in the first trimester of pregnancy had a 70% higher risk of delayed motor development compared to children of mothers who did not use SSRIs.

The study found that children whose mothers used SSRIs during pregnancy had a 25% higher risk of poor motor development compared to those whose mothers did not use SSRIs. The study also found that the risk was highest for children whose mothers used SSRIs in the first trimester of pregnancy. The study's findings suggest that SSRI use during pregnancy may have negative effects on children's motor development.

The study found that children exposed to SSRIs during pregnancy had a statistically significant higher risk of poor motor development at age 3 than children not exposed to SSRIs. The study adjusted for potential confounding factors such as mother's age, education, and mental health, as well as the child's gender and birth weight. The study also found that the risk of poor motor development was higher for children exposed to SSRIs in the second and third trimesters of pregnancy compared to those exposed only in the first trimester. The study suggests that SSRI use during pregnancy may have negative effects on motor development in children. However, further research is needed to confirm these findings and to understand the underlying mechanisms.
filtered_resps: The study did not find any association between prenatal SSRI exposure and motor skill development in girls, but found that boys who were exposed to SSRIs prenatally scored lower on a motor skills test than unexposed boys.
bleu: The study did not find any association between prenatal SSRI exposure and motor skill development in girls, but found that boys who were exposed to SSRIs prenatally scored lower on a motor skills test than unexposed boys.

Institutul Norvegian pentru Sănătate Publică a coordonat un studiu privind dezvoltarea motorie a copiilor ale căror mame s-au tratat cu SSRI, analizând datele a 51 404 de copii din Studiul norvegian de cohortă al mamei și copilului, cercetând efectele utilizării SSRI pentru dezvoltarea abilității motorii la vârsta de 3 ani.

translation.en: The researchers found 381 mothers had used SSRIs while pregnant, and 159 of them were treated with the drugs for a prolonged period.
translation.ro: Cercetătorii au descoperit că 381 de mame folosiseră SSRI în timpul sarcinii, iar 159 dintre acestea s-au tratat cu medicamente o perioadă prelungită.

target: Cercetătorii au descoperit că 381 de mame folosiseră SSRI în timpul sarcinii, iar 159 dintre acestea s-au tratat cu medicamente o perioadă prelungită.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The researchers found 381 mothers had used SSRIs while pregnant, and 159 of them were treated with the drugs for a prolonged period.
resps: Of these, 19 women had babies with birth defects, 10 of them with heart defects.

The researchers tracked the children for an average of 5.5 years after birth. They found the rates of autism spectrum disorder were higher in children whose mothers had used SSRIs. Children exposed to the drugs during the first trimester were more than twice as likely to develop autism, compared with unexposed children. The risk was higher for children whose mothers took SSRIs during the entire pregnancy.

The researchers also found 12,200 mothers who had not used SSRIs while pregnant, and 5,900 of them had been treated for a prolonged period with other drugs. They compared the results to determine whether the mother's prolonged use of SSRIs during pregnancy had an impact on the child's cognitive functioning.
filtered_resps: Of these, 19 women had babies with birth defects, 10 of them with heart defects.
bleu: Of these, 19 women had babies with birth defects, 10 of them with heart defects.
Cercetătorii au descoperit că 381 de mame folosiseră SSRI în timpul sarcinii, iar 159 dintre acestea s-au tratat cu medicamente o perioadă prelungită.

translation.en: While exposure to SSRIs was weakly associated with a delay in motor development, researchers wrote in the study that the association was "not to the extent that the delay was of clinical importance."
translation.ro: Cu toate că expunerea la SSRI a fost asociată într-o oarecare măsură cu o întârziere în dezvoltarea motorie, cercetătorii au scris în studiu că asocierea „nu a fost atât de semnificativă cât să acorde întârzierii o importanță clinică”.

target: Cu toate că expunerea la SSRI a fost asociată într-o oarecare măsură cu o întârziere în dezvoltarea motorie, cercetătorii au scris în studiu că asocierea „nu a fost atât de semnificativă cât să acorde întârzierii o importanță clinică”.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: While exposure to SSRIs was weakly associated with a delay in motor development, researchers wrote in the study that the association was "not to the extent that the delay was of clinical importance."
bleu: Cu toate că expunerea la SSRI a fost asociată într-o oarecare măsură cu o întârziere în dezvoltarea motorie, cercetătorii au scris în studiu că asocierea „nu a fost atât de semnificativă cât să acorde întârzierii o importanță clinică”.

translation.en: A group of researchers at the University of Adelaide in Australia conducted a review of data on 49,000 women in the Danish National Birth Cohort to find the effects of SSRI use on children's behavior by age 7.
translation.ro: Un grup de cercetători de la Universitatea Adelaide din Australia au derulat o examinare a datelor pentru 49 000 de femei din Cohorta națională daneză de nașteri pentru a descoperi efectele administrării de SSRI asupra comportamentului copiilor până la vârsta de 7 ani.

target: Un grup de cercetători de la Universitatea Adelaide din Australia au derulat o examinare a datelor pentru 49 000 de femei din Cohorta națională daneză de nașteri pentru a descoperi efectele administrării de SSRI asupra comportamentului copiilor până la vârsta de 7 ani.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: A group of researchers at the University of Adelaide in Australia conducted a review of data on 49,000 women in the Danish National Birth Cohort to find the effects of SSRI use on children's behavior by age 7.
resps: The results showed that women who used SSRI medications during pregnancy had a 68% increased risk for their child to have ADHD-related behaviors. But, and this is where the translation comes in, the headlines that were generated by this study were not exactly accurate. The actual study did not look at ADHD, but rather at ADHD-related behaviors. The difference between these two terms might seem slight, but it is crucial. ADHD is a clinical diagnosis, whereas ADHD-related behaviors are not. The misinterpretation of the study's findings has led to increased fear among pregnant women that taking SSRIs will lead to ADHD in their children. But the actual study does not support this claim.
They found no significant differences between the 5,698 children exposed to SSRIs and the 43,299 unexposed children.
They found that prenatal exposure to SSRIs was associated with a 28% increase in risk for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).
bleu: Un grup de cercetători de la Universitatea Adelaide din Australia au derulat o examinare a datelor pentru 49 000 de femei din Cohorta națională daneză de nașteri pentru a descoperi efectele administrării de SSRI asupra comportamentului copiilor până la vârsta de 7 ani.

translation.en: The study found that untreated depression in pregnant women was associated with increased risk for problem behavior.
translation.ro: Studiul a descoperit că depresia netratată la femeile însărcinate a fost asociată cu un risc crescut în ceea ce privește problemele de comportament.

target: Studiul a descoperit că depresia netratată la femeile însărcinate a fost asociată cu un risc crescut în ceea ce privește problemele de comportament.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The study found that untreated depression in pregnant women was associated with increased risk for problem behavior.
bleu: Studiul a descoperit că depresia netratată la femeile însărcinate a fost asociată cu un risc crescut în ceea ce privește problemele de comportament.

translation.en: In the 210 children whose mothers were treated for depression with SSRIs there was no increased risk for behavioral problems, as compared with 231 children who were more likely to have behavior issues such as hyperactivity, inattention, and peer problems.
translation.ro: La 210 dintre copiii ale căror mame fuseseră tratate împotriva depresiei cu SSRI nu a existat un risc crescut privind problemele de comportament, comparativ cu cei 231 de copii care au fost mai predispuși spre probleme de comportament precum hiperactivitatea, lipsa de atenție și probleme de socializare.

target: La 210 dintre copiii ale căror mame fuseseră tratate împotriva depresiei cu SSRI nu a existat un risc crescut privind problemele de comportament, comparativ cu cei 231 de copii care au fost mai predispuși spre probleme de comportament precum hiperactivitatea, lipsa de atenție și probleme de socializare.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In the 210 children whose mothers were treated for depression with SSRIs there was no increased risk for behavioral problems, as compared with 231 children who were more likely to have behavior issues such as hyperactivity, inattention, and peer problems.
bleu: La 210 dintre copiii ale căror mame fuseseră tratate împotriva depresiei cu SSRI nu a existat un risc crescut privind problemele de comportament, comparativ cu cei 231 de copii care au fost mai predispuși spre probleme de comportament precum hiperactivitatea, lipsa de atenție și probleme de socializare.

translation.en: The same group of Australian researchers also found in a separate study that mothers are more likely to experience bleeding after giving birth if they were treated with SSRIs.
translation.ro: Același grup de cercetători australieni au descoperit, de asemenea, într-un studiu separat, că mamele sunt mai predispuse la sângerare după naștere dacă sunt tratate cu SSRI.

target: Același grup de cercetători australieni au descoperit, de asemenea, într-un studiu separat, că mamele sunt mai predispuse la sângerare după naștere dacă sunt tratate cu SSRI.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The same group of Australian researchers also found in a separate study that mothers are more likely to experience bleeding after giving birth if they were treated with SSRIs.
resps: The term "bleeding" was translated to Romanian as "sângerare" (a term for any form of bleeding) . However, in obstetrics, bleeding after birth is better translated to Romanian as "hemoragie postpartum" (postpartum hemorrhage).
bleu: Același grup de cercetători australieni au descoperit, de asemenea, într-un studiu separat, că mamele sunt mai predispuse la sângerare după naștere dacă sunt tratate cu SSRI.

translation.en: The review of medical data for 30,198 women who gave birth at a teaching hospital in Adelaide between 2002 and 2008 showed the risk for postpartum hemorrhaging increased by 5 percent, from 11 to 16 percent, if women were treated with SSRIs.
translation.ro: Analiza datelor medicale de la 30 198 care au născut la un spital universitar din Adelaide între 2002 și 2008 a arătat că riscul hemoragiei postnatale a crescut cu 5%, între 11 - 16%, dacă femeile au fost tratate cu SSRI.

target: Analiza datelor medicale de la 30 198 care au născut la un spital universitar din Adelaide între 2002 și 2008 a arătat că riscul hemoragiei postnatale a crescut cu 5%, între 11 - 16%, dacă femeile au fost tratate cu SSRI.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The review of medical data for 30,198 women who gave birth at a teaching hospital in Adelaide between 2002 and 2008 showed the risk for postpartum hemorrhaging increased by 5 percent, from 11 to 16 percent, if women were treated with SSRIs.
resps: The authors of the study suggest that more research is needed to determine if there is a cause-effect relationship.
bleu: Analiza datelor medicale de la 30 198 care au născut la un spital universitar din Adelaide între 2002 și 2008 a arătat că riscul hemoragiei postnatale a crescut cu 5%, între 11 - 16%, dacă femeile au fost tratate cu SSRI.

translation.en: The risk of a severe hemorrhage or postpartum anemia also doubled, the researchers reported.
translation.ro: Riscul unei hemoragii severe sau al anemiei postnatale s-a dublat, au raportat cercetătorii.

target: Riscul unei hemoragii severe sau al anemiei postnatale s-a dublat, au raportat cercetătorii.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The risk of a severe hemorrhage or postpartum anemia also doubled, the researchers reported.
bleu: Riscul unei hemoragii severe sau al anemiei postnatale s-a dublat, au raportat cercetătorii.

translation.en: The researchers said that while the study linked SSRI use to the increased risk, there is a large number of variables -- from drugs used during delivery to the limited amount of information researchers had about specific medical conditions of the women -- which all could have an effect on the potential for bleeding.
translation.ro: Cercetătorii au spus că, cu toate că studiul a legat administrarea de SSRI cu riscul crescut, există un număr mare de variabile - de la medicamentele luate în timpul nașterii la cantitatea limitată de informații avute de cercetători despre afecțiunile medicale specifice ale femeilor - care ar fi putut avea un efect în privința potențialului de sângerare.

target: Cercetătorii au spus că, cu toate că studiul a legat administrarea de SSRI cu riscul crescut, există un număr mare de variabile - de la medicamentele luate în timpul nașterii la cantitatea limitată de informații avute de cercetători despre afecțiunile medicale specifice ale femeilor - care ar fi putut avea un efect în privința potențialului de sângerare.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The researchers said that while the study linked SSRI use to the increased risk, there is a large number of variables -- from drugs used during delivery to the limited amount of information researchers had about specific medical conditions of the women -- which all could have an effect on the potential for bleeding.
bleu: Cercetătorii au spus că, cu toate că studiul a legat administrarea de SSRI cu riscul crescut, există un număr mare de variabile - de la medicamentele luate în timpul nașterii la cantitatea limitată de informații avute de cercetători despre afecțiunile medicale specifice ale femeilor - care ar fi putut avea un efect în privința potențialului de sângerare.

translation.en: "It is possible that the women who took antidepressants late in pregnancy were those with the most severe illness and it is this which is responsible for the increased risk of postpartum haemorrhage and not the antidepressant," said Dr. Luke Grzeskowiak, a professor at the University of Adelaide.
translation.ro: „Este posibil ca femeile care au luat antidepresive într-un stadiu avansat al sarcinii să fi fost cele cu stadiul cel mai grav al bolii, iar acesta este motivul pentru riscul crescut de hemoragie postnatală, nu antidepresivele”, spune doctorul Luke Grzeskowiak, profesor la Universitatea Adelaide.

target: „Este posibil ca femeile care au luat antidepresive într-un stadiu avansat al sarcinii să fi fost cele cu stadiul cel mai grav al bolii, iar acesta este motivul pentru riscul crescut de hemoragie postnatală, nu antidepresivele”, spune doctorul Luke Grzeskowiak, profesor la Universitatea Adelaide.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "It is possible that the women who took antidepressants late in pregnancy were those with the most severe illness and it is this which is responsible for the increased risk of postpartum haemorrhage and not the antidepressant," said Dr. Luke Grzeskowiak, a professor at the University of Adelaide.
bleu: „Este posibil ca femeile care au luat antidepresive într-un stadiu avansat al sarcinii să fi fost cele cu stadiul cel mai grav al bolii, iar acesta este motivul pentru riscul crescut de hemoragie postnatală, nu antidepresivele”, spune doctorul Luke Grzeskowiak, profesor la Universitatea Adelaide.

translation.en: Based on this study alone we do not recommend that women stop taking medication for depression during pregnancy, but are closely monitored in order to reduce the risk of any potential increased risk of bleeding as much as possible.
translation.ro: Doar pe baza acestui studiu nu recomandăm ca femeile să înceteze tratamentul medicamentos împotriva depresiei în timpul sarcinii, ci să fie monitorizate îndeaproape pentru a reduce cât mai mult riscul unei potențiale sângerări.

target: Doar pe baza acestui studiu nu recomandăm ca femeile să înceteze tratamentul medicamentos împotriva depresiei în timpul sarcinii, ci să fie monitorizate îndeaproape pentru a reduce cât mai mult riscul unei potențiale sângerări.

translation.en: Matthew indicted on murder charge in killing of Va. Tech student
translation.ro: Matthew este pus sub acuzare pentru crimă în cazul uciderii studentei de la Universitatea Tehnică Virginia

target: Matthew este pus sub acuzare pentru crimă în cazul uciderii studentei de la Universitatea Tehnică Virginia
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Matthew indicted on murder charge in killing of Va. Tech student
bleu: Matthew este pus sub acuzare pentru crimă în cazul uciderii studentei de la Universitatea Tehnică Virginia

translation.en: The man accused of killing University of Virginia student Hannah Graham has been indicted on a charge of first-degree murder in the slaying of a Virginia Tech student who went missing in 2009, authorities announced Tuesday.
translation.ro: Bărbatul acuzat de uciderea studentei Hannah Graham de la Universitatea Virginia a fost pus sub acuzare pentru omor calificat în cazul unei studente de la Universitatea Tehnică Virginia dispărute în 2009, au anunțat marți autoritățile.

target: Bărbatul acuzat de uciderea studentei Hannah Graham de la Universitatea Virginia a fost pus sub acuzare pentru omor calificat în cazul unei studente de la Universitatea Tehnică Virginia dispărute în 2009, au anunțat marți autoritățile.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The man accused of killing University of Virginia student Hannah Graham has been indicted on a charge of first-degree murder in the slaying of a Virginia Tech student who went missing in 2009, authorities announced Tuesday.
resps: Police in Blacksburg, Virginia, have been trying for years to solve the 2009 disappearance of Morgan Harrington, 20, a Virginia Tech student who vanished after attending a Metallica concert on the University of Virginia campus. Harrington's body was found three months later on a nearby farm. Jesse Matthew, the man accused of killing Hannah Graham, was indicted Tuesday in her death. He also has been charged with abduction with intent to defile in her disappearance. Matthew, 32, of Charlottesville, was previously convicted of misdemeanor sexual assault in Fairfax County.

Jesse Matthew, 33, of Charlottesville, Virginia, was indicted by a Roanoke County grand jury in the death of 20-year-old Morgan Harrington, said Roanoke County Commonwealth's Attorney Donald Caldwell. The indictment comes as Matthew is already facing charges of abduction with intent to defile and first-degree murder in Graham's death.

He also has been charged with abduction with intent to defile in her disappearance. Matthew, 32, of Charlottesville, was previously convicted of misdemeanor sexual assault in Fairfax County.

translation.en: I am very pleased to know that when you take a life, there should be consequences to that act.
translation.ro: Sunt încântată să știu că, atunci când iei viața cuiva, trebuie să suporți consecințele pentru fapta ta.

target: Sunt încântată să știu că, atunci când iei viața cuiva, trebuie să suporți consecințele pentru fapta ta.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: I am very pleased to know that when you take a life, there should be consequences to that act.
resps: You are in the wrong place for that.

I am very pleased to know that you are not a sociopath, and that you recognize that there are certain moral rules that you have to follow in this life and that if you break one of those rules, there will be consequences for that act.
bleu: Sunt încântată să știu că, atunci când iei viața cuiva, trebuie să suporți consecințele pentru fapta ta.

translation.en: Harrington had traveled to U-Va. on Oct. 17, 2009, to attend a Metallica concert with friends.
translation.ro: Harrington se dusese la U-Va. pe 17 octombrie. 2009, împreună cu prietenii, la un concert Metallica.

target: Harrington se dusese la U-Va. pe 17 octombrie. 2009, împreună cu prietenii, la un concert Metallica.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Harrington had traveled to U-Va. on Oct. 17, 2009, to attend a Metallica concert with friends.
resps: Afterward, they had gone to a party at the Phi Delta Theta fraternity house, where Harrington was seen drinking heavily. He left the party shortly before 1 a.m. on Oct. 18 and was last seen by friends near the fraternity house. His body was found four months later.
While at the concert, Harrington and his friends became separated. Harrington was last seen leaving the John Paul Jones Arena, across Emmet Street from the U-Va. grounds, at approximately 11:30 p.m.
bleu: Harrington se dusese la U-Va. pe 17 octombrie. 2009, împreună cu prietenii, la un concert Metallica.

translation.en: The group became separated when Harrington left Charlottesville's John Paul Jones Arena to use the bathroom and could not get back inside.
translation.ro: Grupul s-a separat când Harrington a ieșit de pe John Paul Jones Arena din Charlottesville ca să meargă la baie și nu a mai putut intra înapoi.

target: Grupul s-a separat când Harrington a ieșit de pe John Paul Jones Arena din Charlottesville ca să meargă la baie și nu a mai putut intra înapoi.

target: Ultima oară a fost văzută încercând să ia un taxi în jurul orei 20:30 în fața arenei.

translation.ro: Familia și prietenii au început o căutare extinsă a lui Harrington, absolventă de studii pedagogice, care își dorea să devină profesoară. Cei de la Metallica au scris despre dispariția ei pe site-ul lor web.

Heather's disappearance remained a mystery until 2017, when a man named Jesse Matthew was arrested and charged with her abduction and murder.

translation.en: "It validates that along this path there's been some "Why was she wearing a mini-skirt?" and "Was she asking for it?" kind of talk, and that kind of questioning and characterization doesn't hold up when it's clear there was a predator on the prowl," Harrington said.
translation.ro: „În tot acest timp au existat și discuții de genul „De ce purta fustă scurtă?” și „Și-o căuta cu lumânarea?” însă acest tip de întrebări și judecată nu sunt valabile când este clar că avem de-a face cu un prădător pe urmele vânatului”, a adăugat Harrington.

resps: "And while it may be true that in some cases, women may make mistakes in terms of how they dress or behave, it doesn't ever justify anyone being taken advantage of."

translation.en: In the Fairfax County case, Matthew was convicted of sexually assaulting a young woman in 2005.
translation.ro: În cazul din Fairfax County, Matthew a fost condamnat pentru atac sexual împotriva unei tinere în 2005.

target: În cazul din Fairfax County, Matthew a fost condamnat pentru atac sexual împotriva unei tinere în 2005.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In the Fairfax County case, Matthew was convicted of sexually assaulting a young woman in 2005.
resps: The jury found Matthew guilty of two counts of forcible sodomy and one count of aggravated sexual battery. Matthew was sentenced to serve 25 years in prison. He appealed the conviction, arguing that the jury was not properly instructed about the law of consent. The Court of Appeals of Virginia disagreed and affirmed the conviction. Matthew then appealed to the Supreme Court of Virginia, which also affirmed the conviction. Matthew then filed a petition for writ of habeas corpus in the Fairfax County Circuit Court, arguing that his trial attorney was ineffective for failing to object to the jury instructions. The Circuit Court denied the petition, and Matthew appealed to the Court of Appeals of Virginia. The Court of Appeals affirmed the denial of the petition, and Matthew then appealed to the Supreme Court of Virginia. The Supreme Court granted review and reversed the denial of the petition, holding that Matthew's trial attorney was ineffective for failing to object to the jury instructions. The case was remanded for a new trial.

translation.en: Moreover, the Romanians created a Facebook event called "Jon Snow's Alms" 40 days after the end of the season, which gathered more than 36,000 supporters.
translation.ro: Mai mult, romanii au creat un eveniment pe Facebook, numit "Pomana lui Jon Snow", la 40 de zile de la terminarea sezonului, care a strans peste 36.000 de sustinatori.

target: Mai mult, romanii au creat un eveniment pe Facebook, numit "Pomana lui Jon Snow", la 40 de zile de la terminarea sezonului, care a strans peste 36.000 de sustinatori.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Moreover, the Romanians created a Facebook event called "Jon Snow's Alms" 40 days after the end of the season, which gathered more than 36,000 supporters.
resps: The event called for a protest against Dacian Ciolos, the Romanian Prime Minister at the time, who was accused of being a "White Walker", a fictional humanoid creature with ice-blue eyes and a pale skin, that appears in the series. The protest took place on April 28, 2016, in Bucharest. The entire action, as well as the protest, were covered in international media, with articles published on The New York Times, The Guardian and The Independent.
The event was a play on words, as "Jon Snow" is a character from the series, and "40 days" is the time for alms in the Eastern Orthodox Church.
The event was a success as the participants managed to collect more than 10,000 euros, which were donated to the Romanian Red Cross.

translation.en: Good news for Romania from the European Commission
translation.ro: Veste buna pentru Romania de la Comisia Europeana

target: Veste buna pentru Romania de la Comisia Europeana
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Good news for Romania from the European Commission
bleu: Veste buna pentru Romania de la Comisia Europeana

translation.en: The European Commission decided on Tuesday to resume payments for Romania under the "Economic competitiveness" and "Environment" programs, both interrupted in early April 2015.
translation.ro: Comisia Europeana a luat marti decizia de a relua platile pentru Romania în cadrul programelor "Competitivitate Economica" și "Mediu", ambele intrerupte la inceputul lunii aprilie 2015.

target: Comisia Europeana a luat marti decizia de a relua platile pentru Romania în cadrul programelor "Competitivitate Economica" și "Mediu", ambele intrerupte la inceputul lunii aprilie 2015.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The European Commission decided on Tuesday to resume payments for Romania under the "Economic competitiveness" and "Environment" programs, both interrupted in early April 2015.
resps: The payments will be resumed as of today, after Brussels received and approved Romania's action plan for the reform of the judiciary.

The European executive decided to resume the payments following the completion of a series of audits regarding the use of funds under these programs. Romania is to resume financial contributions from the European Commission for projects under the two programs to the amount of 56.4 million euros, Finance Minister Eugen Teodorovici stated on Tuesday. The money will be used to finance projects in the field of environmental protection, as well as infrastructure projects, the minister said.

The decision came after the European Executive assessed the efforts made by Bucharest in order to address the concerns raised about the mismanagement of European funds allocated to Romania. The Commission has therefore unblocked 125 million euros for the "Economic competitiveness" program and nearly 100 million euros for the "Environment" program.
bleu: Comisia Europeana a luat marti decizia de a relua platile pentru Romania în cadrul programelor "Competitivitate Economica" și "Mediu", ambele intrerupte la inceputul lunii aprilie 2015.

translation.en: According to a press release of Romania's Representation of the European Commission, following this decision, approximately 120 million euro will be transferred to the Romanian authorities in the near future.
translation.ro: Conform unui comunicat al Reprezentantei din Romania a Comisiei Europene, în urma acestei decizii, aproximativ 120 de milioane de euro vor fi transferati autoritatilor romane în perioada imediat urmatoare.

target: Conform unui comunicat al Reprezentantei din Romania a Comisiei Europene, în urma acestei decizii, aproximativ 120 de milioane de euro vor fi transferati autoritatilor romane în perioada imediat urmatoare.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: According to a press release of Romania's Representation of the European Commission, following this decision, approximately 120 million euro will be transferred to the Romanian authorities in the near future.
resps: The first installment will be used to support the implementation of the Schengen Action Plan, which was adopted by the Government in April 2007, as well as to support the implementation of the National Strategy for the Integration of the Roma People. The second installment will be used to co-finance the implementation of the projects included in the National Programme for Development of the Romanian Road Network, which were approved by the European Commission in May 2007. The third installment will be used to support the implementation of the National Programme for Protection of the Environment, which was approved by the European Commission in June 2007. The fourth installment will be used to co-finance the implementation of the National Programme for the Development of the Water Supply and Sewerage Systems, which was approved by the European Commission in September 2007. The fifth and sixth installments will be used to co-finance the implementation of the National Programme for Development of the Renewable Energy Sources, which was approved by the European Commission in October 2007. The seventh installment will be used to co-finance the implementation of the National Programme for Development of

This money will be added to the financial support Romania already receives within the framework of the ESF. The sum is the first instalment within the framework of the new European Union programme, the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF), which was agreed upon by the EU's heads of state and government in December 2005. The programme is designed to reduce regional disparities in the EU, by investing in infrastructure, education and training, and in the development of local businesses. The Romanian authorities have already identified 137 priority projects, 24 of which have already been approved.

The amount, which represents more than 10% of the total financial support granted through the Sectoral Operational Programme Environment, will be used for the implementation of large investment projects. translation.en: European Council President Donald Tusk announced that on Thursday he will take a decision on the possible convening of a European Union summit on the migration in Europe.
translation.ro: Presedintele Consiliului European, Donald Tusk, a anuntat ca joi va lua o decizie privind eventuala convocare a unui summit al Uniunii Europene privind migratia în Europa.

target: Presedintele Consiliului European, Donald Tusk, a anuntat ca joi va lua o decizie privind eventuala convocare a unui summit al Uniunii Europene privind migratia în Europa.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: European Council President Donald Tusk announced that on Thursday he will take a decision on the possible convening of a European Union summit on the migration in Europe.
resps: The visit in Brussels of Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban was the opportunity to discuss the European Union’s policy in the migration crisis, after which the European Council President Donald Tusk announced that on Thursday he will take a decision on the possible convening of a European Union summit on the migration in Europe. Donald Tusk said, after the meeting with Orban, that the EU is currently in a decisive phase of the migration crisis. The European Union has to find solutions as soon as possible, because the current situation is not sustainable anymore.</s>
bleu: Presedintele Consiliului European, Donald Tusk, a anuntat ca joi va lua o decizie privind eventuala convocare a unui summit al Uniunii Europene privind migratia în Europa.

translation.en: In a joint press conference in Berlin, Merkel said that Germany, Austria and Sweden cannot manage alone the refugee crisis.
translation.ro: Intr-o conferinta de presa comuna la Berlin, Merkel a afirmat ca Germania, Austria și Suedia nu pot gestiona singure criza refugiatilor.

target: Intr-o conferinta de presa comuna la Berlin, Merkel a afirmat ca Germania, Austria și Suedia nu pot gestiona singure criza refugiatilor.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In a joint press conference in Berlin, Merkel said that Germany, Austria and Sweden cannot manage alone the refugee crisis.
resps: She urged other European Community members to take part in managing the crisis and to share responsibilities. The German Chancellor, moreover, said that the European solution should equally divide the refugees among the European states and Germany will do its part. She also asked for European Union solidarity in order to address this crisis.</s>
She added that the EU must act together, otherwise the refugee crisis will create a domino effect and other countries will also become destabilized.

translation.en: The first point of the plan, represented by the emergency resettlement of refugees mechanism, provides quick redeployment of 54,000 refugees located in Hungary, 50,400 in Greece and 15,500 in Italy.
translation.ro: Primul punct al planului, reprezentat de mecanismul de relocare de urgenta a refugiatilor, prevede redistribuirea rapida a 54.000 de refugiati aflati în Ungaria, 50.400 în Grecia și 15.500 în Italia.

target: Primul punct al planului, reprezentat de mecanismul de relocare de urgenta a refugiatilor, prevede redistribuirea rapida a 54.000 de refugiati aflati în Ungaria, 50.400 în Grecia și 15.500 în Italia.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The first point of the plan, represented by the emergency resettlement of refugees mechanism, provides quick redeployment of 54,000 refugees located in Hungary, 50,400 in Greece and 15,500 in Italy.
resps: This action is a key element in the plan to reduce the tension of the refugee crisis and to better distribute the burden of the migratory flow within the EU. The second point of the plan, illustrated by the creation of a solidarity mechanism, aims to relocate those refugees in need of international protection, in a proportionate and fair manner among participating Member States, for a period of two years. The total number of refugees to be relocated from Italy and Greece is 160,000, plus 54,000 from Hungary if the Hungarian government decides to participate. The third point of the plan, represented by the creation of a permanent, mandatory and automatically triggered relocation mechanism, aims to establish a more effective and rapid response to any future emergency situations in which the capacity of a Member State to accommodate and integrate refugees is exceeded. The implementation of the mechanism will be based on objective, fair and transparent criteria. The fourth point of the plan, represented by the creation of an emergency fund for migration and asylum, aims to provide financial assistance and technical support to Member States facing significant migratory pressure. The fund is intended to support Member States in their efforts to manage the migratory flow by strengthening their reception

The refugees will be relocated in different member states of the European Union. The second point of the plan involves the reinforcement of the European Union's external borders. The European Commission will allocate 1.7 billion euros. The European Union's border agency, Frontex, will receive new means in order to patrol the external borders and prevent illegal crossing. The plan requires that the members states of the European Union should set up hotspots (centers for receiving and registering the refugees) in the countries of origin or in their transit countries. In the hotspots, the refugees will be identified and classified. The refugees will be separated in two categories: those who can claim asylum in the European Union and those who will be returned to their countries of origin. The third point of the plan refers to the resettlement of refugees. The member states of the European Union will accept, in the next two years, 22,500 refugees from outside the European Union. translation.en: The French satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo causes controversy again after the publication of some caricatures mocking the response of predominantly Christian European countries to the wave of immigrants from predominantly Muslim countries affected by wars.
translation.ro: Publicatia satirica franceza Charlie Hebdo provoaca din nou controverse, dupa publicarea unor caricaturi care batjocoresc raspunsul tarilor europene predominant crestine la valul de imigranti din tarile predominant musulmane afectate de razboaie.

arguments: translate English to Romanian: The French satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo causes controversy again after the publication of some caricatures mocking the response of predominantly Christian European countries to the wave of immigrants from predominantly Muslim countries affected by wars.
resps: The publication caused shock and indignation among the immigrants and their supporters. In the same time, the Europeans who have to pay for the immigrants' housing, food, education, and medical care have expressed support for the satirical magazine.
The magazine has been condemned by certain political and religious leaders, but also by many citizens, for its lack of respect for religious feelings.

translation.en: One of the drawings shows a heart-breaking image of Aylan Kurdi, the drowned Syrian boy, whose body reached one of the Turkish beaches, after a failed attempt of his family to cross the sea by boat from Syria to Greece.
translation.ro: Unul dintre desene infatiseaza o imagine sfasietoare a lui Aylan Kurdi, baietelul sirian inecat, al carui corp a ajuns pe una dintre plajele din Turcia, dupa o incercare esuata de traversare a marii cu barca, de catre familia sa, din Siria în Grecia.

target: Unul dintre desene infatiseaza o imagine sfasietoare a lui Aylan Kurdi, baietelul sirian inecat, al carui corp a ajuns pe una dintre plajele din Turcia, dupa o incercare esuata de traversare a marii cu barca, de catre familia sa, din Siria în Grecia.

translation.en: The drawing from Charlie Hebdo shows a child in shorts and T-shirt, face down on the seashore, near a billboard which offers two children's menus at the price of one.
translation.ro: Desenul din Charlie Hebdo arata un copil în pantaloni scurti și tricou, cu fata în jos pe tarmul marii, langa un panou publicitar care ofera doua meniuri pentru copii la pretul unuia singur.

target: Desenul din Charlie Hebdo arata un copil în pantaloni scurti și tricou, cu fata în jos pe tarmul marii, langa un panou publicitar care ofera doua meniuri pentru copii la pretul unuia singur.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The drawing from Charlie Hebdo shows a child in shorts and T-shirt, face down on the seashore, near a billboard which offers two children's menus at the price of one.
resps: The text in the caption reads: "Promo: So as not to be caught napping on the beach".
(The second child would be free.) The sea is dark blue, the waves are rolling in, and the sky is overcast.
The drowned child is clearly a victim of the Mediterranean migrant crisis, and the billboard advertises the special offer provided as a way to attract customers to the restaurant.
filtered_resps: The text in the caption reads: "Promo: So as not to be caught napping on the beach".
bleu: The text in the caption reads: "Promo: So as not to be caught napping on the beach".

translation.en: "So close to succeed" is the message accompanying the drawing.
translation.ro: "Atat de aproape de a reusi", este mesajul ce insoteste desenul.

target: "Atat de aproape de a reusi", este mesajul ce insoteste desenul.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "So close to succeed" is the message accompanying the drawing.

translation.en: Another drawing, also the work of a cartoonist who survived the attack on the editorial office in Paris, in January, is accompanied by the message "Proof that Europe is Christian."
translation.ro: Un alt desen, de asemenea opera a unui caricaturist care a supravietuit atacului de la sediul redactiei din Paris, din luna ianuarie, este insotit de mesajul "Dovada ca Europa este crestina".

target: Un alt desen, de asemenea opera a unui caricaturist care a supravietuit atacului de la sediul redactiei din Paris, din luna ianuarie, este insotit de mesajul "Dovada ca Europa este crestina".
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Another drawing, also the work of a cartoonist who survived the attack on the editorial office in Paris, in January, is accompanied by the message "Proof that Europe is Christian."
resps: The drawing depicts a hand-drawn sign that reads "Islamists are incompatible with European values," with the word "Islamists" crossed out and replaced with "Muslims." The drawing was also picked up by the Romanian media.

The phrase is a reference to a statement made by French President Emmanuel Macron, in November 2017, when he referred to the reconciliation process in the Central African Republic (CAR), and stated that it was "proof that religions can work together, because Europe is Christian." In the cartoon, a woman--presumably Christian--is depicted in front of a door, with the door's peephole revealing the face of a man, presumably Muslim, wearing a kaffiyeh and holding a knife, as if to suggest a threat. The woman's arm is raised, as if she is holding a cross, but it is not immediately clear if she is extending it in a protective gesture or in an aggressive one, as if to strike.
bleu: Un alt desen, de asemenea opera a unui caricaturist care a supravietuit atacului de la sediul redactiei din Paris, din luna ianuarie, este insotit de mesajul "Dovada ca Europa este crestina".

translation.en: The drawing also shows a figure similar to Jesus walking on water, while a smaller character wears shorts and is with his feet upside down in water, the first saying "Christians walk on water", and the second "Muslim children drown".
translation.ro: Desenul prezinta un personaj asemenea lui Iisus, care merge pe apa, în timp ce un personaj mai mic poarta pantaloni scurti cu picioarele în sus în apa, primul spunand "crestinii merg pe apa", ia al doilea "copiii musulmani se ineaca".

translation.en: The French magazine has become a symbol of freedom of expression, after it was the target of an attack by Islamic militants in January, as a result of repeated threats for mocking Prophet Mohammed.
translation.ro: Revista franceza a devenit un simbol al libertatii de exprimare, dupa ce a fost tinta unui atac al militantilor islamisti, în luna ianuarie, ca urmare a unor repetate amenintari dupa batjocorirea profetului Mahomed.

target: Revista franceza a devenit un simbol al libertatii de exprimare, dupa ce a fost tinta unui atac al militantilor islamisti, în luna ianuarie, ca urmare a unor repetate amenintari dupa batjocorirea profetului Mahomed.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The French magazine has become a symbol of freedom of expression, after it was the target of an attack by Islamic militants in January, as a result of repeated threats for mocking Prophet Mohammed.
resps: The attack led to the death of 12 people, including 8 journalists. The magazine's editor, Stéphane Charbonnier, was among the victims.
The magazine has continued to publish controversial cartoons of the Prophet Mohammed and other religious figures, after the attack, receiving a lot of criticism from various religious groups.

bleu: The attack led to the death of 12 people, including 8 journalists. The magazine's editor, Stéphane Charbonnier, was among the victims.

translation.en: A supermarket chain with branches in Romania, fined drastically in Russia
translation.ro: Un lant de supermarketuri prezent în Romania, amendat drastic în Rusia

target: Un lant de supermarketuri prezent în Romania, amendat drastic în Rusia
arguments: translate English to Romanian: A supermarket chain with branches in Romania, fined drastically in Russia
resps: for labeling products from Russian-occupied Crimea as 'made in Ukraine'
, for supplying expired food products on the Russian market.
bleu: Un lant de supermarketuri prezent în Romania, amendat drastic în Rusia

translation.en: The French supermarket chain Auchan was fined more than 370,000 dollars by Russian officials, being accused with food safety violations.
translation.ro: Lantul francez de supermarketuri Auchan a fost amendat cu peste 370.000 de dolari de oficialii rusi, fiind acuzat de incalcari ale sigurantei alimentare.

target: Lantul francez de supermarketuri Auchan a fost amendat cu peste 370.000 de dolari de oficialii rusi, fiind acuzat de incalcari ale sigurantei alimentare.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The French supermarket chain Auchan was fined more than 370,000 dollars by Russian officials, being accused with food safety violations.
bleu: Lantul francez de supermarketuri Auchan a fost amendat cu peste 370.000 de dolari de oficialii rusi, fiind acuzat de incalcari ale sigurantei alimentare.

translation.en: Anna Popova, head of the Russian consumer protection agency Rospotrebnadzor, said that the fines total more than 25 million rubbles, i.e. 372,000 dollars, reports Associated Press, quoted by US News.
translation.ro: Anna Popova, seful agentiei ruse pentru protectia consumatorului Rospotrebnadzor, a declarat ca amenzile totalizeaza peste 25 de milioane de ruble, adica 372.000 de dolari, relateaza agentia Associated Press, citata de US News.

target: Anna Popova, seful agentiei ruse pentru protectia consumatorului Rospotrebnadzor, a declarat ca amenzile totalizeaza peste 25 de milioane de ruble, adica 372.000 de dolari, relateaza agentia Associated Press, citata de US News.

translation.en: However, the reasons for these fines were not revealed and Auchan did not make any comment.
translation.ro: Nu au fost insa precizate motivele pentru care s-au acordat aceste amenzi, iar Auchan nu a facut vreun comentariu.

target: Nu au fost insa precizate motivele pentru care s-au acordat aceste amenzi, iar Auchan nu a facut vreun comentariu.

translation.en: Food controls come at a time of tension between France and Russia on the enlargement of the European Union's sanctions and France's decision to cancel an agreement for the supply of Mistral ships to Russia.
translation.ro: Controalele alimentare vin intr-o perioada de tensiune dintre Franta și Rusia, pe tema extinderii sanctiunilor Uniunii Europene și a deciziei Frantei de a anula o intelegere privind furnizarea de nave Mistral Rusiei.

translation.en: Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs reacted to the news that Hungary may build a metal fence at the border with Romania.
translation.ro: Ministerul roman al Afacerilor Externe a reactionat la stirea ca Ungaria ar putea sa ridice un gard metalic la frontiera cu tara noastra.

target: Ministerul roman al Afacerilor Externe a reactionat la stirea ca Ungaria ar putea sa ridice un gard metalic la frontiera cu tara noastra.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs reacted to the news that Hungary may build a metal fence at the border with Romania.
bleu: Ministerul roman al Afacerilor Externe a reactionat la stirea ca Ungaria ar putea sa ridice un gard metalic la frontiera cu tara noastra.

translation.en: The Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that the news about this decision came up short and that this is not a politically correct gesture.
translation.ro: MAE arata ca a fost informat din scurt în legatura cu aceasta decizie și ca acesta nu este un gest corect din punct de vedere politic.

target: MAE arata ca a fost informat din scurt în legatura cu aceasta decizie și ca acesta nu este un gest corect din punct de vedere politic.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that the news about this decision came up short and that this is not a politically correct gesture.
bleu: MAE arata ca a fost informat din scurt în legatura cu aceasta decizie și ca acesta nu este un gest corect din punct de vedere politic.

translation.en: The Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs declares, in a press release to Ziare.com, that it was informed by the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs on this intention shortly before being publicly announced.
translation.ro: MAE arata, intr-un comunicat remis redactiei Ziare.com, ca a fost informat de catre Ministerul ungar al Afacerilor Externe cu privire la aceasta intentie cu putin timp inainte de a fi anuntata public.

target: MAE arata, intr-un comunicat remis redactiei Ziare.com, ca a fost informat de catre Ministerul ungar al Afacerilor Externe cu privire la aceasta intentie cu putin timp inainte de a fi anuntata public.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs declares, in a press release to Ziare.com, that it was informed by the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs on this intention shortly before being publicly announced.
resps: The Romanian government has taken note of this intention and will make comments after the Hungarian government will decide on the final form of the bill, due to be adopted in the following days.

The Romanian Foreign Ministry added that it will request an explanation from the Hungarian side regarding the reason why it was not consulted before this decision, and also regarding the guarantees that the rights of the Romanian national minority in Hungary will not be affected.
User 4: >The Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs declares, in a press release to Ziare.com, that it was informed by the Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs on this intention shortly before being publicly announced.

translation.en: In turn, the Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs informed in a timely and urgent manner the competent decision making bodies of Romania about this situation.
translation.ro: La randul sau, MAE a informat în timp util, de urgenta, factorii de decizie competenti din Romania în legatura cu aceasta situatie.

target: La randul sau, MAE a informat în timp util, de urgenta, factorii de decizie competenti din Romania în legatura cu aceasta situatie.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In turn, the Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs informed in a timely and urgent manner the competent decision making bodies of Romania about this situation.
resps: The Romanian Ambassador in Bucharest, Ovidiu Dragan, had talks with the Romanian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Teodor Baconschi, who appreciated the steps taken by the Romanian Foreign Ministry and by the Romanian Ambassador in Tirana, who is close to the Romanian community in Albania. The Romanian Minister of Foreign Affairs sent an official letter to the Albanian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ilir Meta, informing him about the steps taken by the Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, asking the Albanian authorities to take steps to remedy the situation of the Romanian citizens who are now in a difficult situation.
bleu: La randul sau, MAE a informat în timp util, de urgenta, factorii de decizie competenti din Romania în legatura cu aceasta situatie.

translation.en: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs states that raising a fence between two member states of the European Union which are also strategic partners is not a politically correct gesture, in accordance with the European spirit.
translation.ro: Ministerul Afacerilor Externe considera ca ridicarea unui gard intre doua state membre ale Uniunii Europene și care sunt parteneri strategici nu este un gest corect din punct de vedere politic, în conformitate cu spiritul european.

target: Ministerul Afacerilor Externe considera ca ridicarea unui gard intre doua state membre ale Uniunii Europene și care sunt parteneri strategici nu este un gest corect din punct de vedere politic, în conformitate cu spiritul european.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs states that raising a fence between two member states of the European Union which are also strategic partners is not a politically correct gesture, in accordance with the European spirit.
bleu: Ministerul Afacerilor Externe considera ca ridicarea unui gard intre doua state membre ale Uniunii Europene și care sunt parteneri strategici nu este un gest corect din punct de vedere politic, în conformitate cu spiritul european.

translation.en: This position has already been communicated to the Hungarian side, it is mentioned in the press release.
translation.ro: Aceasta pozitie a fost deja comunicata partii ungare, se mai arata în comunicat.

target: Aceasta pozitie a fost deja comunicata partii ungare, se mai arata în comunicat.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: This position has already been communicated to the Hungarian side, it is mentioned in the press release.
resps: There is also a political will to continue this dialogue at a technical level.

translation.en: Hungary is making plans to build a metal fence on the border with Romania, in the context of the immigrants crisis, declared on Tuesday the Hungarian Foreign Minister, Peter Szijjarto, quoted by Mediafax.
translation.ro: Ungaria face planuri pentru construirea unui gard metalic pe un segment al frontierei cu Romania, în contextul crizei imigrantilor, a afirmat marti ministrul ungar de Externe, Peter Szijjarto, citat de Mediafax.

target: Ungaria face planuri pentru construirea unui gard metalic pe un segment al frontierei cu Romania, în contextul crizei imigrantilor, a afirmat marti ministrul ungar de Externe, Peter Szijjarto, citat de Mediafax.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Hungary is making plans to build a metal fence on the border with Romania, in the context of the immigrants crisis, declared on Tuesday the Hungarian Foreign Minister, Peter Szijjarto, quoted by Mediafax.
resps: The original English article is published here: http://www.mediafax.ro/externe/budapesta-anunta-construirea-unui-zid-de-metal-pe-frontiera-cu-romania-13553050

The original English statement was: Hungary is planning to build a metal fence on the border with Romania in the context of the migrant crisis, Hungarian Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto said on Tuesday.

translation.en: "The measure is necessary because human traffickers transiting Serbia change their routes, and there is the possibility they head towards Romania", said the head of the Hungarian diplomacy.
translation.ro: "Masura este necesara pentru ca traficantii de persoane care tranziteaza Serbia isi schimba rutele, existand probabilitatea sa se indrepte spre Romania", a explicat seful diplomatiei ungare.

target: "Masura este necesara pentru ca traficantii de persoane care tranziteaza Serbia isi schimba rutele, existand probabilitatea sa se indrepte spre Romania", a explicat seful diplomatiei ungare.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "The measure is necessary because human traffickers transiting Serbia change their routes, and there is the possibility they head towards Romania", said the head of the Hungarian diplomacy.
bleu: "Masura este necesara pentru ca traficantii de persoane care tranziteaza Serbia isi schimba rutele, existand probabilitatea sa se indrepte spre Romania", a explicat seful diplomatiei ungare.

translation.en: "The fence would start at the border between Hungary / Serbia / Romania and continue for a reasonable distance if the pressure of migration moves to Romania," said Szijjarto.
translation.ro: "Gardul ar urma sa inceapa de la punctul frontierei dintre Ungaria/Serbia/Romania și sa continue pe o distanta rezonabila daca presiunea migratiei se muta spre Romania", a explicat Szijjarto.

target: "Gardul ar urma sa inceapa de la punctul frontierei dintre Ungaria/Serbia/Romania și sa continue pe o distanta rezonabila daca presiunea migratiei se muta spre Romania", a explicat Szijjarto.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "The fence would start at the border between Hungary / Serbia / Romania and continue for a reasonable distance if the pressure of migration moves to Romania," said Szijjarto.

translation.en: In late August, the press reported that non-EU immigrants transiting Serbian territory in their way to the EU were trying to bypass the fence built by the Hungarian authorities by its eastern end at the common border between Serbia, Hungary and Romania.
translation.ro: La sfarsitul lunii august, presa relata ca imigrantii extracomunitari care tranziteaza teritoriul sarb în drumul spre Uniunea Europeana incearcau sa ocoleasca gardul construit de autoritatile ungare prin capatul estic al acestuia, la frontiera comuna dintre Serbia, Ungaria și Romania.

target: La sfarsitul lunii august, presa relata ca imigrantii extracomunitari care tranziteaza teritoriul sarb în drumul spre Uniunea Europeana incearcau sa ocoleasca gardul construit de autoritatile ungare prin capatul estic al acestuia, la frontiera comuna dintre Serbia, Ungaria și Romania.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In late August, the press reported that non-EU immigrants transiting Serbian territory in their way to the EU were trying to bypass the fence built by the Hungarian authorities by its eastern end at the common border between Serbia, Hungary and Romania.
resps: The Romanian side is now also preparing a fence along the border with Serbia.
The Hungarian authorities have decided to build a new 41 km long fence along this border section with Romania.
bleu: La sfarsitul lunii august, presa relata ca imigrantii extracomunitari care tranziteaza teritoriul sarb în drumul spre Uniunea Europeana incearcau sa ocoleasca gardul construit de autoritatile ungare prin capatul estic al acestuia, la frontiera comuna dintre Serbia, Ungaria și Romania.

translation.en: In this context, non-EU immigrants discovered they can bypass the fence in the localities Majdan / Rade (Serbia) - Beba Veche (Timis, Romania) - Kübekháza (Hungary).
translation.ro: În acest context, imigrantii extracomunitari au descoperit ca pot ocoli gardul prin zona localitatilor Majdan/Rade (Serbia) - Beba Veche (Timis, Romania) - Kubekhaza (Ungaria).

target: În acest context, imigrantii extracomunitari au descoperit ca pot ocoli gardul prin zona localitatilor Majdan/Rade (Serbia) - Beba Veche (Timis, Romania) - Kubekhaza (Ungaria).
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In this context, non-EU immigrants discovered they can bypass the fence in the localities Majdan / Rade (Serbia) - Beba Veche (Timis, Romania) - Kübekháza (Hungary).
resps: In this context, the Romanian Gendarmerie in Timis made a record of 44 cases of illegal crossing the border during 2 days, as opposed to 2 cases made during the month of January.
bleu: În acest context, imigrantii extracomunitari au descoperit ca pot ocoli gardul prin zona localitatilor Majdan/Rade (Serbia) - Beba Veche (Timis, Romania) - Kubekhaza (Ungaria).

translation.en: The Hungarian government allocated 22.2 billion forints (71.8 million euros) to build a controversial metal fence at the border with Serbia, for a distance of 175 kilometres and for special accommodation centres necessary for immigrants.
translation.ro: Guvernul Ungariei a alocat 22,2 miliarde de forinti (71,8 milioane de euro) pentru construirea unui controversat gard metalic la frontiera cu Serbia, pe o distanta de 175 de kilometri, și pentru centre speciale necesare cazarii imigrantilor.

target: Guvernul Ungariei a alocat 22,2 miliarde de forinti (71,8 milioane de euro) pentru construirea unui controversat gard metalic la frontiera cu Serbia, pe o distanta de 175 de kilometri, și pentru centre speciale necesare cazarii imigrantilor.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Hungarian government allocated 22.2 billion forints (71.8 million euros) to build a controversial metal fence at the border with Serbia, for a distance of 175 kilometres and for special accommodation centres necessary for immigrants.
resps: The works are planned to begin in July and to be completed by the end of September. The Hungarian prime minister stated that the fence is not built to keep the immigrants out, but to protect the Hungarian border, as the immigrants are only passing through Hungary, on their way to Western European countries. The fence will be 3.5 metres high and will be equipped with barbed wire, cameras and night vision devices. The immigrants will be allowed to cross the border only at the legally established border crossings.
bleu: Guvernul Ungariei a alocat 22,2 miliarde de forinti (71,8 milioane de euro) pentru construirea unui controversat gard metalic la frontiera cu Serbia, pe o distanta de 175 de kilometri, și pentru centre speciale necesare cazarii imigrantilor.

translation.en: The fence initiative is criticized by the European Union and Serbia.
translation.ro: Initiativa gardului este criticata de Uniunea Europeana și de Serbia.

translation.en: The coffin with the body of Corneliu Vadim Tudor will not be placed in Romania's Senate, despite the politician's widow wish.
translation.ro: Sicriul cu trupul neinsufletit al lui Corneliu Vadim Tudor nu va fi depus în Senatul Romaniei, în ciuda dorintei în acest sens exprimata de vaduva politicianului.

target: Sicriul cu trupul neinsufletit al lui Corneliu Vadim Tudor nu va fi depus în Senatul Romaniei, în ciuda dorintei în acest sens exprimata de vaduva politicianului.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The coffin with the body of Corneliu Vadim Tudor will not be placed in Romania's Senate, despite the politician's widow wish.
resps: The Romanian Senate's Speaker, Florin Citu, said on Monday that a coffin with the body of Corneliu Vadim Tudor will not be placed in the parliament building, as wished by the politician's widow, and the funeral will not be held inside the Senate Palace.
filtered_resps: The Romanian Senate's Speaker, Florin Citu, said on Monday that a coffin with the body of Corneliu Vadim Tudor will not be placed in the parliament building, as wished by the politician's widow, and the funeral will not be held inside the Senate Palace.
bleu: The Romanian Senate's Speaker, Florin Citu, said on Monday that a coffin with the body of Corneliu Vadim Tudor will not be placed in the parliament building, as wished by the politician's widow, and the funeral will not be held inside the Senate Palace.
Sicriul cu trupul neinsufletit al lui Corneliu Vadim Tudor nu va fi depus în Senatul Romaniei, în ciuda dorintei în acest sens exprimata de vaduva politicianului.

translation.en: According to a press release issued to Ziare.com, the Senate's Permanent Bureau has discussed on Tuesday a request made by Doina Vadim Tudor, regarding the placement of the body of the former senator Corneliu Vadim Tudor in the Senate's seat.
translation.ro: Potrivit unui comunicat remis Ziare.com, Biroul Permanent al Senatului a luat în discutie, marti, o solicitare a Doinei Vadim Tudor, privind aprobarea depunerii corpului neinsufletit al fostului senator Corneliu Vadim Tudor în sediul Senatului.

target: Potrivit unui comunicat remis Ziare.com, Biroul Permanent al Senatului a luat în discutie, marti, o solicitare a Doinei Vadim Tudor, privind aprobarea depunerii corpului neinsufletit al fostului senator Corneliu Vadim Tudor în sediul Senatului.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: According to a press release issued to Ziare.com, the Senate's Permanent Bureau has discussed on Tuesday a request made by Doina Vadim Tudor, regarding the placement of the body of the former senator Corneliu Vadim Tudor in the Senate's seat.
resps: The Bureau decided to submit this request to the Senate's plenary session.
The Permanent Bureau has rejected the request.
filtered_resps: The Bureau decided to submit this request to the Senate's plenary session.
bleu: The Bureau decided to submit this request to the Senate's plenary session.

Potrivit unui comunicat remis Ziare.com, Biroul Permanent al Senatului a luat în discutie, marti, o solicitare a Doinei Vadim Tudor, privind aprobarea depunerii corpului neinsufletit al fostului senator Corneliu Vadim Tudor în sediul Senatului.

translation.en: "From the receipt of this letter until the time of its analysis, in the Permanent Bureau, the body has already been deposited in a place of worship and it will remain there, the Permanent Bureau considering that there no need for it to be moved from there to the Senate", the Senate of Romania notes.
translation.ro: "De la primirea acestei scrisori pana la momentul analizei, în Biroul Permanent, corpul neinsufletit a fost deja depus la un lacas de cult și va ramane acolo, Biroul Permanent apreciind ca nu mai e nevoie sa fie deplasat de acolo la Senatul Romaniei", transmite Senatul.

target: "De la primirea acestei scrisori pana la momentul analizei, în Biroul Permanent, corpul neinsufletit a fost deja depus la un lacas de cult și va ramane acolo, Biroul Permanent apreciind ca nu mai e nevoie sa fie deplasat de acolo la Senatul Romaniei", transmite Senatul.

bleu: "De la primirea acestei scrisori pana la momentul analizei, în Biroul Permanent, corpul neinsufletit a fost deja depus la un lacas de cult și va ramane acolo, Biroul Permanent apreciind ca nu mai e nevoie sa fie deplasat de acolo la Senatul Romaniei", transmite Senatul.

translation.en: PNL (Liberal National Party) Senator Teodor Atanasiu said that this request "is not in agreement with the geographical position of Romania somewhere in Europe."
translation.ro: Senatorul PNL Teodor Atanasiu a sustinut ca aceasta solicitare "nu este în acord cu pozitia geografica a Romaniei undeva în Europa".

target: Senatorul PNL Teodor Atanasiu a sustinut ca aceasta solicitare "nu este în acord cu pozitia geografica a Romaniei undeva în Europa".

resps: However, he did not mention whether he would object to the name change of the Black Sea to the Blue Sea.
However, the Romanian language is a Romance language, like Spanish, French, Portuguese, and Italian.

translation.en: In addition, according to Agerpres, the senators held a moment of silence in memory of the former PRM (Great Romania Party) leader, at the proposal of UNPR (National Union for the Progress of Romania) Senator Serban Mihailescu.
translation.ro: De asemenea, transmite Agerpres, senatorii au tinut un moment de reculegere în memoria fostului lider PRM, la propunerea senatorului UNPR Serban Mihailescu.

target: De asemenea, transmite Agerpres, senatorii au tinut un moment de reculegere în memoria fostului lider PRM, la propunerea senatorului UNPR Serban Mihailescu.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In addition, according to Agerpres, the senators held a moment of silence in memory of the former PRM (Great Romania Party) leader, at the proposal of UNPR (National Union for the Progress of Romania) Senator Serban Mihailescu.
resps: Corneliu Vadim Tudor was a senator and then a deputy in the Romanian Parliament for 22 years, where he was a member of the Foreign Policy Committees and, since 2000, of the Defense, Public Order and National Security Committee, as well as the Parliamentary Friendship Groups with Russia, China, Iran and India. He was also a member of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly.
bleu: De asemenea, transmite Agerpres, senatorii au tinut un moment de reculegere în memoria fostului lider PRM, la propunerea senatorului UNPR Serban Mihailescu.

translation.en: Corneliu Vadim Tudor died Monday evening at around 6:30 p.m..
