translation.en: The Mayors of the border towns from Arad county are questioned by the police and border police for accommodation for potential refugees who could arrive in Romania, but also for the gendarmerie, if they are to be deployed on the border.
translation.ro: Primarii din localitatile de frontiera din judetul Arad sunt chestionati de Politie și Politia de Frontiera, în aceste zile, privind locurile de cazare pentru eventualii refugiati care ar putea ajunge în Romania, dar și pentru jandarmi, în cazul în care vor fi mobilizati la granita.

target: Primarii din localitatile de frontiera din judetul Arad sunt chestionati de Politie și Politia de Frontiera, în aceste zile, privind locurile de cazare pentru eventualii refugiati care ar putea ajunge în Romania, dar și pentru jandarmi, în cazul în care vor fi mobilizati la granita.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Mayors of the border towns from Arad county are questioned by the police and border police for accommodation for potential refugees who could arrive in Romania, but also for the gendarmerie, if they are to be deployed on the border.
bleu: Primarii din localitatile de frontiera din judetul Arad sunt chestionati de Politie și Politia de Frontiera, în aceste zile, privind locurile de cazare pentru eventualii refugiati care ar putea ajunge în Romania, dar și pentru jandarmi, în cazul în care vor fi mobilizati la granita.

translation.en: The Mayor of Nadlac, Vasile Ciceac, said he had meetings on this topic.
translation.ro: Edilul orasului Nadlac, Vasile Ciceac, a afirmat ca a avut intalniri pe aceasta tema.

target: Edilul orasului Nadlac, Vasile Ciceac, a afirmat ca a avut intalniri pe aceasta tema.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Mayor of Nadlac, Vasile Ciceac, said he had meetings on this topic.
bleu: Edilul orasului Nadlac, Vasile Ciceac, a afirmat ca a avut intalniri pe aceasta tema.

translation.en: The discussions were held including with farmers in the area, who were asked to report the presence on any foreigners near the border.
translation.ro: Discutii au fost purtate inclusiv cu fermierii din zona, carora li s-a cerut sa raporteze despre prezenta oricaror straini în apropiere de granita.

target: Discutii au fost purtate inclusiv cu fermierii din zona, carora li s-a cerut sa raporteze despre prezenta oricaror straini în apropiere de granita.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The discussions were held including with farmers in the area, who were asked to report the presence on any foreigners near the border.
bleu: Discutii au fost purtate inclusiv cu fermierii din zona, carora li s-a cerut sa raporteze despre prezenta oricaror straini în apropiere de granita.

translation.en: I had discussions with the border police, national police and local police, but also with the farmers in the area.
translation.ro: Am avut discutii cu politistii de frontiera, Politia nationala și Politia locala, dar și cu agricultorii din zona.

target: Am avut discutii cu politistii de frontiera, Politia nationala și Politia locala, dar și cu agricultorii din zona.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: I had discussions with the border police, national police and local police, but also with the farmers in the area.
resps: I visited every village in the area, and I have participated in numerous meetings, public debates, conferences and workshops. I have also consulted with the civil society, with the media, with the Sibiu County National Agency for the Protection of the Environment and with the Romanian Border Police, which is part of the Romanian Government. I also consulted with the local administration and with the local farmers, and with the inspectorates for emergency situations and local authorities in the border area. I also consulted with the Sibiu County Council and with the Sibiu Chamber of Commerce, Industry and Agriculture. I have also worked with local prosecutors, criminal investigation units and with international organizations. I have also participated in several European conferences on the subject and in a number of study visits in a few European countries to learn from their experience.

I had the opportunity to meet with the border police chief and with a national police chief. I had the opportunity to meet the local police chief, and to meet with the heads of the farmers’ association, the association that is responsible for managing the system of flood prevention, and the association that is responsible for the management of the area.
bleu: Am avut discutii cu politistii de frontiera, Politia nationala și Politia locala, dar și cu agricultorii din zona.

translation.en: We all need to be more vigilant in the coming period.
translation.ro: Cu totii trebuie sa fim mai vigilenti în urmatoarea perioada.

target: Cu totii trebuie sa fim mai vigilenti în urmatoarea perioada.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: We all need to be more vigilant in the coming period.
bleu: Cu totii trebuie sa fim mai vigilenti în urmatoarea perioada.

translation.en: "We have asked the farmers, who work on the arable lands during this time, to be alert and report any movement," said the mayor.
translation.ro: "Le-am cerut fermierilor, care au lucrari în aceasta perioada pe terenurile arabile, sa fie atenti și sa raporteze orice miscare", a declarat edilul.

target: "Le-am cerut fermierilor, care au lucrari în aceasta perioada pe terenurile arabile, sa fie atenti și sa raporteze orice miscare", a declarat edilul.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "We have asked the farmers, who work on the arable lands during this time, to be alert and report any movement," said the mayor.
resps: "We are in a high state of alert."
The Romanian translation for the phrase "to be alert" is "să fie vigilenți".
bleu: "Le-am cerut fermierilor, care au lucrari în aceasta perioada pe terenurile arabile, sa fie atenti și sa raporteze orice miscare", a declarat edilul.

translation.en: Migrants crisis erupts in Hungary: Armour-clad vehicles and water cannons at the border
translation.ro: Criza imigrantilor da în clocot în Ungaria: Blindate și tunuri de apa la granita

target: Criza imigrantilor da în clocot în Ungaria: Blindate și tunuri de apa la granita

bleu: Criza imigrantilor da în clocot în Ungaria: Blindate și tunuri de apa la granita

translation.en: Like the other mayors from the border with Hungary, he said that the police demanded information on accommodation available in case of a wave of refugees.
translation.ro: Acesta, la fel ca alti primari din zona de granita cu Ungaria, a spus ca Politia a cerut informatii privind locurile de cazare disponibile în cazul confruntarii cu un val de refugiati.

target: Acesta, la fel ca alti primari din zona de granita cu Ungaria, a spus ca Politia a cerut informatii privind locurile de cazare disponibile în cazul confruntarii cu un val de refugiati.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Like the other mayors from the border with Hungary, he said that the police demanded information on accommodation available in case of a wave of refugees.
resps: The mayor of Satu Mare, Gheorghe Flutur, said that the Hungarian authorities have informed the Romanian colleagues about the situation and asked that they be prepared for emergencies.
bleu: Acesta, la fel ca alti primari din zona de granita cu Ungaria, a spus ca Politia a cerut informatii privind locurile de cazare disponibile în cazul confruntarii cu un val de refugiati.

translation.en: We were asked how many people we can accommodate.
translation.ro: Am fost intrebati cate persoane putem caza.

target: Am fost intrebati cate persoane putem caza.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: We were asked how many people we can accommodate.
bleu: Am fost intrebati cate persoane putem caza.

translation.en: In our town there is no space for refugees.
translation.ro: La noi în comuna nu avem spatii pentru refugiati.

target: La noi în comuna nu avem spatii pentru refugiati.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In our town there is no space for refugees.
bleu: La noi în comuna nu avem spatii pentru refugiati.

translation.en: We believe that such special centres should not exist at the border, because they are more difficult to control, as the migrants are tempted to flee, because they are not interested to remain in Romania.
translation.ro: Noi credem ca astfel de centre speciale nici nu trebuie sa apara la frontiera, pentru ca sunt mai greu de controlat aici, migrantii fiind tentati sa fuga, pentru ca nu sunt interesati sa ramana în Romania.

target: Noi credem ca astfel de centre speciale nici nu trebuie sa apara la frontiera, pentru ca sunt mai greu de controlat aici, migrantii fiind tentati sa fuga, pentru ca nu sunt interesati sa ramana în Romania.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: We believe that such special centres should not exist at the border, because they are more difficult to control, as the migrants are tempted to flee, because they are not interested to remain in Romania.
bleu: Noi credem ca astfel de centre speciale nici nu trebuie sa apara la frontiera, pentru ca sunt mai greu de controlat aici, migrantii fiind tentati sa fuga, pentru ca nu sunt interesati sa ramana în Romania.

translation.en: The best thing would be to be set up such centres in areas far from the border" stated the Mayor of Iratosu commune, Papp Atila Iosif.
translation.ro: Cel mai bine ar fi sa fie infiintate astfel de centre în zone mai indepartate de granita", a declarat primarul comunei Iratosu, Papp Atila Iosif.

target: Cel mai bine ar fi sa fie infiintate astfel de centre în zone mai indepartate de granita", a declarat primarul comunei Iratosu, Papp Atila Iosif.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The best thing would be to be set up such centres in areas far from the border" stated the Mayor of Iratosu commune, Papp Atila Iosif.
bleu: Cel mai bine ar fi sa fie infiintate astfel de centre în zone mai indepartate de granita", a declarat primarul comunei Iratosu, Papp Atila Iosif.

translation.en: In turn, the mayor of Dorobanti commune, Vincentiu Almasi, said that he was asked about accommodation places for both the refugees and the intervention forces if they were to be deployed in the area.
translation.ro: La randul sau, primarul comunei Dorobanti, Vincentiu Almasi, a spus ca a fost intrebat atat de locuri de cazare pentru refugiati, cat și pentru fortele de interventie, în caz ca acestea ar fi mobilizate în zona.

target: La randul sau, primarul comunei Dorobanti, Vincentiu Almasi, a spus ca a fost intrebat atat de locuri de cazare pentru refugiati, cat și pentru fortele de interventie, în caz ca acestea ar fi mobilizate în zona.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In turn, the mayor of Dorobanti commune, Vincentiu Almasi, said that he was asked about accommodation places for both the refugees and the intervention forces if they were to be deployed in the area.
resps: The Romanian Border Police was also asked about the problems that could arise if the refugees were to be taken to the Dorobanti commune.
bleu: La randul sau, primarul comunei Dorobanti, Vincentiu Almasi, a spus ca a fost intrebat atat de locuri de cazare pentru refugiati, cat și pentru fortele de interventie, în caz ca acestea ar fi mobilizate în zona.

translation.en: The police asked if we can accommodate gendarmes too.
translation.ro: Politia s-a interesat daca putem caza și jandarmi.

target: Politia s-a interesat daca putem caza și jandarmi.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The police asked if we can accommodate gendarmes too.
bleu: Politia s-a interesat daca putem caza și jandarmi.

translation.en: We can find places in the Cultural Centres, but we cannot accommodate refugees.
translation.ro: Am putea gasi locuri la Caminul Cultural, dar pentru refugiati nu avem nicio posibilitate de cazare.

target: Am putea gasi locuri la Caminul Cultural, dar pentru refugiati nu avem nicio posibilitate de cazare.

translation.en: "We have also been asked about the length of the border with Hungary. They are probably working on an action plan," said Vincentiu Almasi.
translation.ro: "Am mai fost chestionati despre lungimea frontierei cu Ungaria, probabil ca se lucreaza la un plan de actiune", a declarat Vincentiu Almasi.

target: "Am mai fost chestionati despre lungimea frontierei cu Ungaria, probabil ca se lucreaza la un plan de actiune", a declarat Vincentiu Almasi.

translation.en: He added that at the local police station, "starting Tuesday, when Hungary has sealed its border with Serbia, a permanent activity was established".
translation.ro: El a adaugat ca la postul local de Politie, "incepand de marti, de cand Ungaria și-a sigilat frontiera cu Serbia, s-a instituit permanenta".

target: El a adaugat ca la postul local de Politie, "incepand de marti, de cand Ungaria și-a sigilat frontiera cu Serbia, s-a instituit permanenta".

translation.en: "There is always a police officer in the station, and people know they have to report if they see any foreigner in the area," stated the mayor.
translation.ro: "Exista tot timpul un politist la post, iar localnicii stiu ca trebuie sa informeze daca observa orice strain în zona", a spus edilul.

target: "Exista tot timpul un politist la post, iar localnicii stiu ca trebuie sa informeze daca observa orice strain în zona", a spus edilul.

translation.en: Pilu City Hall representatives said they can accommodate no more than a hundred people in the Cultural Centre, and the information was provided to the police, at their request.
translation.ro: Reprezentantii Primariei Pilu au afirmat ca pot caza cel mult o suta de persoane, la Caminul Cultural, informatiile fiind oferite politistilor, la solicitarea acestora.

translation.en: In addition, the Mayor of Curtici city, Nicolae Aanitei, said there are accommodation spaces in the former headquarters of the local Public Finance Directorate, but improvements are necessary.

translation.en: Moreover, a former barrack of the Border Police could be equipped to accommodate refugees.
translation.ro: De asemenea, o fosta cazarma a Politiei de Frontiera ar putea fi amenajata pentru a gazdui refugiati.

target: De asemenea, o fosta cazarma a Politiei de Frontiera ar putea fi amenajata pentru a gazdui refugiati.

translation.en: The region "full" of millionaires
translation.ro: Regiunea care "colcaie" de milionari

translation.en: Asia-Pacific millionaires will form this year the group with the richest people in the world, thanks to their fortunes accumulated in China and India, according to a study released on Wednesday by RBC Wealth Management and Capgemini.
translation.ro: Milionarii din Asia-Pacific vor forma, în acest an, grupul celor mai bogati oameni din lume, gratie averilor acumulate în China și India, arata un studiu publicat miercuri de Capgemini și RBC Wealth Management.

target: Milionarii din Asia-Pacific vor forma, în acest an, grupul celor mai bogati oameni din lume, gratie averilor acumulate în China și India, arata un studiu publicat miercuri de Capgemini și RBC Wealth Management.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Asia-Pacific millionaires will form this year the group with the richest people in the world, thanks to their fortunes accumulated in China and India, according to a study released on Wednesday by RBC Wealth Management and Capgemini.
bleu: Milionarii din Asia-Pacific vor forma, în acest an, grupul celor mai bogati oameni din lume, gratie averilor acumulate în China și India, arata un studiu publicat miercuri de Capgemini și RBC Wealth Management.

translation.en: According to this document, in 2015 the cumulative fortunes of Asia Pacific millionaires will exceed the total of 15.800 billion dollars recorded in 2014 and the fortunes of the North America's millionaires, which currently represent the richest people in the world, with a cumulative fortune of 16,200 billion dollars, according to AFP.
translation.ro: Potrivit acestui document, în 2015, averile cumulate ale milionarilor din Asia Pacific vor depasi totalul de 15.800 miliarde de dolari inregistrat în 2014, precum și averile milionarilor din America de Nord, care, momentan, reprezinta cei mai bogati oameni din lume, cu o avere cumulata de 16.200 miliarde de dolari, transmite AFP.

target: Potrivit acestui document, în 2015, averile cumulate ale milionarilor din Asia Pacific vor depasi totalul de 15.800 miliarde de dolari inregistrat în 2014, precum și averile milionarilor din America de Nord, care, momentan, reprezinta cei mai bogati oameni din lume, cu o avere cumulata de 16.200 miliarde de dolari, transmite AFP.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: According to this document, in 2015 the cumulative fortunes of Asia Pacific millionaires will exceed the total of 15.800 billion dollars recorded in 2014 and the fortunes of the North America's millionaires, which currently represent the richest people in the world, with a cumulative fortune of 16,200 billion dollars, according to AFP.
bleu: Potrivit acestui document, în 2015, averile cumulate ale milionarilor din Asia Pacific vor depasi totalul de 15.800 miliarde de dolari inregistrat în 2014, precum și averile milionarilor din America de Nord, care, momentan, reprezinta cei mai bogati oameni din lume, cu o avere cumulata de 16.200 miliarde de dolari, transmite AFP.

translation.en: The study states that the Asia Pacific region already has the highest number of very rich people, known in financial jargon as High Net Worth Individuals, HNWI, with 4.69 million of such individuals in 2014 compared to 4.68 million in North America .
translation.ro: Studiul precizeaza ca regiunea Asia Pacific are deja cel mai mare numar de persoane foarte bogate, denumite în jargon financiar High Net Worth Individuals, HNWI, cu 4,69 milioane de astfel de indivizi în 2014, fata de 4,68 milioane în America de Nord.

target: Studiul precizeaza ca regiunea Asia Pacific are deja cel mai mare numar de persoane foarte bogate, denumite în jargon financiar High Net Worth Individuals, HNWI, cu 4,69 milioane de astfel de indivizi în 2014, fata de 4,68 milioane în America de Nord.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The study states that the Asia Pacific region already has the highest number of very rich people, known in financial jargon as High Net Worth Individuals, HNWI, with 4.69 million of such individuals in 2014 compared to 4.68 million in North America .
bleu: Studiul precizeaza ca regiunea Asia Pacific are deja cel mai mare numar de persoane foarte bogate, denumite în jargon financiar High Net Worth Individuals, HNWI, cu 4,69 milioane de astfel de indivizi în 2014, fata de 4,68 milioane în America de Nord.

translation.en: HNWIs are people who can invest at least a million dollars, without taking into account the value of real estate and other possessions.
translation.ro: HNWI sunt persoanele care pot investi cel putin un milion de dolari, fara a tine cont de valoarea proprietatilor imobiliare și a altor posesiuni.

target: HNWI sunt persoanele care pot investi cel putin un milion de dolari, fara a tine cont de valoarea proprietatilor imobiliare și a altor posesiuni.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: HNWIs are people who can invest at least a million dollars, without taking into account the value of real estate and other possessions.
bleu: HNWI sunt persoanele care pot investi cel putin un milion de dolari, fara a tine cont de valoarea proprietatilor imobiliare și a altor posesiuni.

translation.en: "In the future, HNWIs fortune is expected to grow further in the Asia Pacific region than in any other region of the world, most of the new fortunes coming from the emerging economies of China, India, Indonesia and Thailand," mentions the study conducted by Capgemini and RBC Wealth Management.
translation.ro: "În viitor, averea HNWI este asteptata sa creasca mai mult în Asia Pacific decat în orice alta regiune a lumii, cea mai mare parte a noilor averi urmand sa provina din economiile emergente ale Chinei, Indiei, Indoneziei și Thailandei", se arata în studiul realizat de Capgemini și RBC Wealth Management.

target: "În viitor, averea HNWI este asteptata sa creasca mai mult în Asia Pacific decat în orice alta regiune a lumii, cea mai mare parte a noilor averi urmand sa provina din economiile emergente ale Chinei, Indiei, Indoneziei și Thailandei", se arata în studiul realizat de Capgemini și RBC Wealth Management.

translation.en: The report estimates that China and India account for nearly 10% of the global HNWI wealth and are responsible for 17% of global growth of new fortunes after 2006.
translation.ro: Raportul estimeaza ca China și India reprezinta aproape 10% din averea globala a HNWI și sunt responsabile pentru 17% din cresterea globala a noilor averi dupa 2006.

target: Raportul estimeaza ca China și India reprezinta aproape 10% din averea globala a HNWI și sunt responsabile pentru 17% din cresterea globala a noilor averi dupa 2006.

translation.en: China, the world's second largest economy after the US, had in 2014 a total of 890,000 millionaires with an accumulated fortune of 4.500 billion dollars and an increase of 17.5% and 19.3% compared to 2013.
translation.ro: China, a doua economie a lumii dupa SUA, avea în 2014 un numar de 890.000 de milionari cu o avere cumulata de 4.500 de miliarde de dolari, în crestere cu 17,5%, respectiv 19,3%, comparativ cu 2013.

Any pedestrian that tries to cross the street is attacked by the cars from all four sides. They are all in a hurry, even the pedestrians.

translation.en: The police used water cannons on immigrants
translation.ro: Politia a pus tunurile cu apa pe imigranti

target: Politia a pus tunurile cu apa pe imigranti
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The police used water cannons on immigrants
resps: demonstrating for their rights.
- How to translate Romanian to English: Poliția a folosit tunuri de apă asupra imigranților

translation.en: Hungarian guards used on Wednesday water cannons and teargas against immigrants at the main Hungarian border with Serbia.
translation.ro: La principala granita a Ungariei cu Serbia granicerii ungari au folosit, miercuri, tunuri cu apa și gaze lacrimogene impotriva imigrantilor.

target: La principala granita a Ungariei cu Serbia granicerii ungari au folosit, miercuri, tunuri cu apa și gaze lacrimogene impotriva imigrantilor.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Hungarian guards used on Wednesday water cannons and teargas against immigrants at the main Hungarian border with Serbia.
bleu: La principala granita a Ungariei cu Serbia granicerii ungari au folosit, miercuri, tunuri cu apa și gaze lacrimogene impotriva imigrantilor.

translation.en: Although Hungary has closed the border with barbed wire fence and introduced tough measures against illegal immigrants, including arrest, refugees continue to gather at the Serbian-Hungarian border, according to The Guardian.
translation.ro: Cu toate ca Ungaria a inchis granita cu un gard de sarma ghimpata și a introdus masuri dure impotriva imigrantilor ilegali, inclusiv arestul, la granita sarbo-ungara au continuat sa se adune refugiati, scrie The Guardian.

target: Cu toate ca Ungaria a inchis granita cu un gard de sarma ghimpata și a introdus masuri dure impotriva imigrantilor ilegali, inclusiv arestul, la granita sarbo-ungara au continuat sa se adune refugiati, scrie The Guardian.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Although Hungary has closed the border with barbed wire fence and introduced tough measures against illegal immigrants, including arrest, refugees continue to gather at the Serbian-Hungarian border, according to The Guardian.

translation.en: Water cannons were put into operation when the immigrants managed to enter through the barbed wire fence at the Röszke border crossing point.
translation.ro: Tunurile cu apa au fost puse în functiune cand imigrantii au reusit sa patrunda prin gardul de sarma ghimpata prin punctul de trecere la frontiera de la Roszke.

target: Tunurile cu apa au fost puse în functiune cand imigrantii au reusit sa patrunda prin gardul de sarma ghimpata prin punctul de trecere la frontiera de la Roszke.

bleu: Tunurile cu apa au fost puse în functiune cand imigrantii au reusit sa patrunda prin gardul de sarma ghimpata prin punctul de trecere la frontiera de la Roszke.

translation.en: Hungarian police said that the use of water cannons was a measure to control the crowd, who was throwing water bottles.
translation.ro: Politia ungara sustine ca actionarea tunurilor a fost o masura de control a multimii, care arunca cu sticle de apa.

target: Politia ungara sustine ca actionarea tunurilor a fost o masura de control a multimii, care arunca cu sticle de apa.

translation.en: There are no reports of any injuries, but some people were crying after the use of teargas.

translation.en: In parallel with the Hungarian border confrontations, Croatia has mobilized to provide buses to the immigrants to transport those who come at the country's border with Serbia.
translation.ro: În paralel cu confruntarile de la granita Ungariei, Croatia s-a mobilizat pentru a pune la dispozitia imigrantilor autobuze pentru a-i transporta pe cei care se prezinta la granita tarii cu Serbia.

translation.en: The Croatian Interior Ministry confirmed that buses were sent to the border to bring immigrants to the reception centres.
translation.ro: Ministerul croat de Interne a confirmat ca autobuzele au fost trimise la granita pentru a duce imigrantii la centrele de primire.

translation.en: Tsipras about the Greek drama - why he agrees with the third agreement with EU
translation.ro: Tsipras, despre drama Greciei - de ce este de acord cu al treilea acord cu UE

target: Tsipras, despre drama Greciei - de ce este de acord cu al treilea acord cu UE
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Tsipras about the Greek drama - why he agrees with the third agreement with EU
resps: , IMF and ECB
bleu: Tsipras, despre drama Greciei - de ce este de acord cu al treilea acord cu UE

translation.en: The purpose of the former Greek prime minister Alexis Tsipras was to save the country from even more austerity and fundamentally change its relationship with the EU leadership in Brussels.
translation.ro: Scopul declarat al fostului premier grec Alexis Tsipras a fost sa salveze tara de la și mai multa austeritate și sa schimbe fundamental relatia acesteia cu conducerea UE de la Bruxelles.

target: Scopul declarat al fostului premier grec Alexis Tsipras a fost sa salveze tara de la și mai multa austeritate și sa schimbe fundamental relatia acesteia cu conducerea UE de la Bruxelles.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The purpose of the former Greek prime minister Alexis Tsipras was to save the country from even more austerity and fundamentally change its relationship with the EU leadership in Brussels.
resps: The aim of the current Romanian prime minister Dacian Ciolos is more modest: he wants to ensure that the country's economic policies are sustainable and that the EU funds allocated to Romania are used more effectively.
The purpose of the German Chancellor Angela Merkel, on the other hand, was to save the EU from Greek bankruptcy and to insist on the same principles for all EU members.
The Greek prime minister Alexis Tsipras intended to save the country from further austerity and fundamentally change its relationship with the EU leadership in Brussels.
bleu: Scopul declarat al fostului premier grec Alexis Tsipras a fost sa salveze tara de la și mai multa austeritate și sa schimbe fundamental relatia acesteia cu conducerea UE de la Bruxelles.

translation.en: Eventually, the leader of Syriza party made Greece enter into a third loan agreement, which results in more years of austerity and reform, according to Euronews which publishes an interview with him.
translation.ro: În cele din urma, liderul Syriza a facut din Grecia parte a unui al treilea acord de imprumut pentru aceasta tara, ceea ce implica și mai multi ani de austeritate și de reforma, potrivit Euronews, care reda un interviu cu acesta.

target: În cele din urma, liderul Syriza a facut din Grecia parte a unui al treilea acord de imprumut pentru aceasta tara, ceea ce implica și mai multi ani de austeritate și de reforma, potrivit Euronews, care reda un interviu cu acesta.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Eventually, the leader of Syriza party made Greece enter into a third loan agreement, which results in more years of austerity and reform, according to Euronews which publishes an interview with him.
bleu: În cele din urma, liderul Syriza a facut din Grecia parte a unui al treilea acord de imprumut pentru aceasta tara, ceea ce implica și mai multi ani de austeritate și de reforma, potrivit Euronews, care reda un interviu cu acesta.

translation.en: Now, however, Tsipras asks the Greeks again to entrust him with the prime minister position, during an election which he says will strengthen his political position.
translation.ro: Acum, insa, Tsipras cere grecilor sa ii incredinteze din nou mandatul de premier, în cadrul unor alegeri despre care sustine ca ii vor intari pozitia politica.

target: Acum, insa, Tsipras cere grecilor sa ii incredinteze din nou mandatul de premier, în cadrul unor alegeri despre care sustine ca ii vor intari pozitia politica.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Now, however, Tsipras asks the Greeks again to entrust him with the prime minister position, during an election which he says will strengthen his political position.
resps: It is a strategic move to seek the support of the Greek electorate for the deal he made with the EU, which will allow the country to get more time to repay the debt, but also austerity measures attached to this deal.
bleu: Acum, insa, Tsipras cere grecilor sa ii incredinteze din nou mandatul de premier, în cadrul unor alegeri despre care sustine ca ii vor intari pozitia politica.

translation.en: Our goal was to get an agreement, not to exit from the Eurozone or the dismantling of the Eurozone.
translation.ro: Scopul nostru a fost sa obtinem un acord, nu o iesire din zona euro sau dezmembrarea zonei euro.

target: Scopul nostru a fost sa obtinem un acord, nu o iesire din zona euro sau dezmembrarea zonei euro.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Our goal was to get an agreement, not to exit from the Eurozone or the dismantling of the Eurozone.

translation.en: "Now for the first time, the possibility for the restructuring of Greece's debt remains open," said the former Greek Prime Minister.
translation.ro: "Acum, pentru prima oara, ramane dechisa posibilitatea restructurarii datoriei pentru Grecia", a mai declarat fostul premier elen.

translation.en: A man aged 23 from Georgia suffered first degree burns, fractured neck and finger and a hole as big of a coin in his palate, after an electronic cigarette he was smoking blew up in his face.
translation.ro: Un barbat în varsta de 23 de ani din Georgia a suferit arsuri de gradul unu, fractura la gat și la un deget și o gaura cat o moneda în cerul gurii, dupa ce o tigareta electronica pe care o fuma i-a explodat în fata.

target: Un barbat în varsta de 23 de ani din Georgia a suferit arsuri de gradul unu, fractura la gat și la un deget și o gaura cat o moneda în cerul gurii, dupa ce o tigareta electronica pe care o fuma i-a explodat în fata.

translation.en: James Lauria was taking a short smoking break at his job when the incident that put him for a week in intensive care occurred, writes The Daily Mail.
translation.ro: James Lauria facea o pauza scurta de fumat la slujba, cand a avut loc incidentul în urma caruia a ramas internat o saptamana la terapie intensiva, scrie The Daily Mail.

target: James Lauria facea o pauza scurta de fumat la slujba, cand a avut loc incidentul în urma caruia a ramas internat o saptamana la terapie intensiva, scrie The Daily Mail.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: James Lauria was taking a short smoking break at his job when the incident that put him for a week in intensive care occurred, writes The Daily Mail.
resps: "A man in a car stopped at a red light, got out and started shouting abuse at Mr Lauria, 23, for smoking. He then produced a claw hammer and smashed the window, causing the glass to shatter and cut Mr Lauria's throat," the article says.
bleu: James Lauria facea o pauza scurta de fumat la slujba, cand a avut loc incidentul în urma caruia a ramas internat o saptamana la terapie intensiva, scrie The Daily Mail.

translation.en: The series of events "Cargo - 30 years" continues with a new really special show - "Honoris Cargo", which will take place on December 11 at Patria Cinema in Bucharest.
translation.ro: Seria de evenimente "Cargo - 30 de ani" continua cu un nou spectacol cu totul special- "Honoris Cargo", care se va desfacura pe 11 decembrie la Cinema Patria din Bucuresti.

target: Seria de evenimente "Cargo - 30 de ani" continua cu un nou spectacol cu totul special- "Honoris Cargo", care se va desfacura pe 11 decembrie la Cinema Patria din Bucuresti.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The series of events "Cargo - 30 years" continues with a new really special show - "Honoris Cargo", which will take place on December 11 at Patria Cinema in Bucharest.
resps: On the occasion of this event, Cargo and the Romanian record company Universal Music Romania will launch the book "Cargo - 30 years of Romanian rock". The book contains the story of the group, as well as an extensive photo gallery. The publication is accompanied by a CD, which includes some of the band's most popular tracks.

The event is organized by Cargo Event, to celebrate 30 years of activity and the values ​​that have been and will continue to be the basis of the company's existence. The evening will be hosted by the actor / presenter Marius Rizea and will include the presence of special guests, such as: Cargo Band, Marius Moga, Connect-R, Raluka, Andreea Banica, Edward Maya, Cristina Rus etc.

The famous Romanian rock band Cargo celebrates 30 years of existence with a special show, planned for one evening only, which will include some of the most beloved songs, interpreted in a special way, with guests, symphonic orchestra and many surprises.

resps: On September 2, a white neighbor, Karl Oliver, was riding his motorcycle in front of her house when he fell and broke his leg. Oliver accused the woman of pushing him, and she was arrested the next day.

translation.en: Syrian President Bashar al Assad gave a rare interview to the Russian media, in which he speaks about the refugees and accuses the West of supporting terrorists and that the immigrants are being "targeted".
translation.ro: Presedintele sirian Bashar al Assad a acordat un rar interviu presei ruse, în care vorbeste depre refugiati și acuza Occidentul ca sustine teroristii și ca ii "ia în vizor" pe imigranti.

target: Presedintele sirian Bashar al Assad a acordat un rar interviu presei ruse, în care vorbeste depre refugiati și acuza Occidentul ca sustine teroristii și ca ii "ia în vizor" pe imigranti.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Syrian President Bashar al Assad gave a rare interview to the Russian media, in which he speaks about the refugees and accuses the West of supporting terrorists and that the immigrants are being "targeted".
resps: "They are being used as a tool against the countries that oppose the terrorists, in the first place Russia and the United States," said Assad. The Syrian leader also said the immigrants are not "real refugees" but "economic migrants."
filtered_resps: "They are being used as a tool against the countries that oppose the terrorists, in the first place Russia and the United States," said Assad. The Syrian leader also said the immigrants are not "real refugees" but "economic migrants."
bleu: "They are being used as a tool against the countries that oppose the terrorists, in the first place Russia and the United States," said Assad. The Syrian leader also said the immigrants are not "real refugees" but "economic migrants."

translation.en: "The West weeps for them and yet the West has supported terrorists even from the beginning of the crisis, when it was said that this is a peaceful uprising," said Assad, in an interview with Russia Today.
translation.ro: "Occientul plange pentru ei și Occidentul sustine teroristii de la inceputul crizei, cand a spus ca aceasta este o revolta pasnica", a spus Assad, intr-un interviu acordat Russia Today.

target: "Occientul plange pentru ei și Occidentul sustine teroristii de la inceputul crizei, cand a spus ca aceasta este o revolta pasnica", a spus Assad, intr-un interviu acordat Russia Today.

translation.en: The leader in Damascus states his Western counterparts say that the situation in Syria is the same as the Islamic State terrorism, "but it's happening because of the Syrian government, the Syrian regime or the Syrian president".
translation.ro: Liderul de la Damasc sustine ca omologii sai occidentali spun despre situatia din Siria ca este terorism asemenea Statului Islamic, "dar din cauza statului sirian sau a regimului sirian sau a presedintelui sirian".

target: Liderul de la Damasc sustine ca omologii sai occidentali spun despre situatia din Siria ca este terorism asemenea Statului Islamic, "dar din cauza statului sirian sau a regimului sirian sau a presedintelui sirian".

translation.en: As long as this propaganda continues, there will be more refugees.
translation.ro: Atata timp cat urmeaza aceasta propaganda, vor avea mai multi refugiati.

target: Atata timp cat urmeaza aceasta propaganda, vor avea mai multi refugiati.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: As long as this propaganda continues, there will be more refugees.
bleu: Atata timp cat urmeaza aceasta propaganda, vor avea mai multi refugiati.

translation.en: So it is not that Europe has not accepted or embraced them as refugees, is about not treating the cause.
translation.ro: Deci nu este vorba despre faptul ca Europa nu i-a acceptat sau nu i-a imbratisat ca refugiati, este despre a nu trata cauza.

target: Deci nu este vorba despre faptul ca Europa nu i-a acceptat sau nu i-a imbratisat ca refugiati, este despre a nu trata cauza.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: So it is not that Europe has not accepted or embraced them as refugees, is about not treating the cause.
resps: But in a way, in a way they were treated as refugees, but in a way they were also treated as enemy forces. And the way I would interpret this statement is that the EU, as a whole, did not treat the Syrian refugees as refugees in the true sense of the word, i.e. as people deserving of protection and assistance, but rather as a threat to be contained and managed. This is reflected in the EU's approach to the refugee crisis, which has focused on strengthening border controls and increasing cooperation with countries outside the EU to prevent refugees from reaching Europe. This approach has been criticized for prioritizing the EU's security interests over the rights and needs of refugees, and for contributing to the suffering and exploitation of refugees in transit countries.
bleu: Deci nu este vorba despre faptul ca Europa nu i-a acceptat sau nu i-a imbratisat ca refugiati, este despre a nu trata cauza.

translation.en: If you are worried about them, you are no longer supporting terrorists.

translation.en: The West is now weeping for the refugees with one eye and targets them with a machine gun with the other eye, because those refugees have actually left Syria due to terrorism, in principle because of terrorist crimes and secondarily because the results of terrorism.

translation.en: "When you have terrorism and the destruction of the infrastructure, you will no longer have basic living resources, and as a result many people leave because of terrorism and because they want to earn a living somewhere in this world", says Bashar al Assad.
translation.ro: "Cand ai terorism și ai distrugerea infrastructurii, nu vei avea resursele de trai de baza, astfel incat multi oameni pleaca din cauza terorismului și din cauza ca vor sa-și castige existenta undeva în aceasta lume", mai spune Bashar al Assad.

target: "Cand ai terorism și ai distrugerea infrastructurii, nu vei avea resursele de trai de baza, astfel incat multi oameni pleaca din cauza terorismului și din cauza ca vor sa-și castige existenta undeva în aceasta lume", mai spune Bashar al Assad.

translation.en: "If you ask any Syrian today what he wants, the first thing he would say would be 'We want security and safety for every person and every family'", said the Syrian President, adding that political forces, whether they are part of the Government or not, "should unite around what is wanted by the Syrian people".

target: "Daca intrebam orice sirian astazi ce vrea, primul lucru pe care l-ar spune ar fi 'Vrem securitate și siguranta pentru fiecare persoana și fiecare familie'", a subliniat presedintele sirian, adaugand ca fortele politice, fie ca se afla în interiorul sau în afara guvernului, "ar trebui sa se uneasca în jurul a ce vrea poporul sirian".

resps: Asked about the recent meetings between the Government and the opposition, he said that "there is no opposition. There are political forces with which we are in contact and which are active in Syria. We are in constant contact with them and we have not yet reached an agreement on any level.

"Daca intrebam orice sirian astazi ce vrea, primul lucru pe care l-ar spune ar fi 'Vrem securitate și siguranta pentru fiecare persoana și fiecare familie'", a subliniat presedintele sirian, adaugand ca fortele politice, fie ca se afla în interiorul sau în afara guvernului, "ar trebui sa se uneasca în jurul a ce vrea poporul sirian".

translation.en: The Syrian President believes that the dialogue in his country should continue "to reach a consensus", which cannot be implemented "unless Syria overpowers terrorism".
translation.ro: Presedintele Siriei este de parere ca dialogul din tara sa ar trebui continuat "pentru a ajunge la un consens", care nu poate fi implementat "decat daca infrangem terorismul în Siria".

translation.en: "I would like to take this opportunity to ask all forces to unite against terrorism, because this is how the political objectives can be achieved, objectives that we as Syrians, want to achieve through dialogue and political action", said Bashar al Assad.
translation.ro: "As vrea sa profit de aceasta oportunitate pentru a cere tuturor fortelor sa se uneasca impotriva terorismului, deoarece este modul în care se pot atinge obiectivele politice pe care noi, ca sirieni, le dorim prin dialog și actiune politica", a mai declarat Bashar al Assad.

target: Observati ce s-a intamplat în presa occidentala dupa lovitura din Ucraina.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Watch what happened in the Western media after the blow in Ukraine.
resps: It is a huge topic, but the summary is that the new government is in the hands of the far right with a few neoliberal technocrats. The government is very unstable and could fall at any time. The far right has a huge influence on the government and on the army. The US will use this government to build a NATO base in Odessa, a large port, and a strategic location to control the Black Sea. The US will use the new government to control Ukraine and to surround Russia. The US will send troops to Ukraine and will build military installations for NATO. The US is already heavily involved in Ukraine. The US is using the Ukrainian army and the Ukrainian neo-Nazis to fight the Russian-speaking people of Ukraine. The US will use Ukraine to start a war with Russia. The US is already preparing for a war with Russia.
bleu: Observati ce s-a intamplat în presa occidentala dupa lovitura din Ucraina.

Where are you?

translation.en: President Putin was transformed from a friend of the West into an foe and was characterized as a tsar.
translation.ro: Presedintele Putin a fost transformat dintr-un prieten al Occidentului intr-un dusman și a fost caracterizat ca un tar.

target: Presedintele Putin a fost transformat dintr-un prieten al Occidentului intr-un dusman și a fost caracterizat ca un tar.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: President Putin was transformed from a friend of the West into an foe and was characterized as a tsar.
resps: The West's diplomacy towards Russia became more and more confrontational. The West was not ready to recognize the annexation of Crimea, and it imposed economic sanctions on Russia as well as diplomatic and political consequences.
bleu: Presedintele Putin a fost transformat dintr-un prieten al Occidentului intr-un dusman și a fost caracterizat ca un tar.

translation.en: He is portrayed as a dictator who suppresses the opposition in Russia and who came to power by undemocratic means, despite the fact that he was elected in democratic elections, and the West itself has acknowledged that the elections were democratic.
translation.ro: Este portretizat ca un dictator care suprima Opozitia din Rusia și care a ajuns la putere prin mijloace nedemocratice, în ciuda faptului ca a fost ales în alegeri democratice, iar Occidentul insusi a recunoscut ca alegerile au fost democratice.

target: Este portretizat ca un dictator care suprima Opozitia din Rusia și care a ajuns la putere prin mijloace nedemocratice, în ciuda faptului ca a fost ales în alegeri democratice, iar Occidentul insusi a recunoscut ca alegerile au fost democratice.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: He is portrayed as a dictator who suppresses the opposition in Russia and who came to power by undemocratic means, despite the fact that he was elected in democratic elections, and the West itself has acknowledged that the elections were democratic.
resps: The election was held in 2000 and since then Putin has been in power for 20 years. During this time, he has amassed a lot of power, there have been several assassinations of his opponents, and he has managed to manipulate the Russian constitution so that he can remain in power indefinitely.

The democratically elected government was overthrown too quickly and this is what started the political chaos. Putin is seen as a strong leader who is able to restore order and stability. He is also seen as a protector of Russia's national interests.
bleu: Este portretizat ca un dictator care suprima Opozitia din Rusia și care a ajuns la putere prin mijloace nedemocratice, în ciuda faptului ca a fost ales în alegeri democratice, iar Occidentul insusi a recunoscut ca alegerile au fost democratice.

translation.en: Now, they are no longer democratic.
translation.ro: Acum, nu mai sunt democratice.

target: Acum, nu mai sunt democratice.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Now, they are no longer democratic.
bleu: Acum, nu mai sunt democratice.

translation.en: "This is Western propaganda", said the leader in Damascus.
translation.ro: "Asta este propaganda occidentala", a punctat liderul de la Damasc.

target: "Asta este propaganda occidentala", a punctat liderul de la Damasc.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "This is Western propaganda", said the leader in Damascus.
resps: "This is all part of a psychological campaign," he said.
The translation of "Western propaganda" in Romanian is "propaganda vestică".
bleu: "Asta este propaganda occidentala", a punctat liderul de la Damasc.

translation.en: Last but not least, he included Russia on the list of friendly countries - and regional partners - with which Syria is ready to cooperate in the fight against terrorism, along with Iran and Iraq, "as they faces the same kind of terrorism".
translation.ro: Nu în ultimul rand, acesta a inclus Rusia pe lista tarilor prietene - și parteneri regionali - cu care Siria este pregatita sa coopereze în lupta impotriva terorismului, alaturi de Iran și Irak, "deoarece se confrunta cu acelasi tip de terorism".

translation.en: Instead, Bashar Assad criticized Turkey, another neighbouring country, President Recep Erdogan and Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu, saying that " they cannot make even a move without coordinating first with the United States and other Western countries. "
translation.ro: În schimb, Bashar al Assad a criticat Turcia, o alta tara vecina, precum și pe presedintele Recep Erdogan și pe premierul Ahmet Davutoglu, despre care a spus ca "nu pot sa faca nici macar o miscare fara a se coordona intai cu Statele Unite și cu alte tari occidentale".

translation.en: In addition, Syria's President accuses the "international coalition" led by the United States, which fights against terrorism: "In fact, since this coalition began to operate, the Islamic State has begun to expand."
translation.ro: În plus, presedintele Siriei acuza "coalitia internationala", condusa de Statele Unite, care lupta impotriva terorismului: "De fapt, de cand aceasta coalitie a inceput sa opereze, Statul Islamic a inceput sa se extinda".

target: În plus, presedintele Siriei acuza "coalitia internationala", condusa de Statele Unite, care lupta impotriva terorismului: "De fapt, de cand aceasta coalitie a inceput sa opereze, Statul Islamic a inceput sa se extinda".

translation.en: In other words, the coalition has failed and has no impact in the field.
translation.ro: Cu alte cuvinte, coalitia a esuat și nu are niciun impact pe teren.

target: Cu alte cuvinte, coalitia a esuat și nu are niciun impact pe teren.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In other words, the coalition has failed and has no impact in the field.
bleu: Cu alte cuvinte, coalitia a esuat și nu are niciun impact pe teren.

translation.en: Meanwhile, countries such as Turkey, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and Western countries that provide coverage for terrorism, as France, the US and others cannot fight terrorism.
translation.ro: În acelasi timp, tari precum Turcia, Qatar, Arabia Saudita și tarile occidentale care asigura o acoperire pentru terorism, ca Franta, Statele Unite sau altele, nu pot lupta impotriva terorismului.

target: În acelasi timp, tari precum Turcia, Qatar, Arabia Saudita și tarile occidentale care asigura o acoperire pentru terorism, ca Franta, Statele Unite sau altele, nu pot lupta impotriva terorismului.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Meanwhile, countries such as Turkey, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and Western countries that provide coverage for terrorism, as France, the US and others cannot fight terrorism.
resps: Their coverage is at an ideological, financial and military level. It is about time for them to bear the responsibility, to stop covering terrorism and to prosecute it. This is the only way to fight terrorism. In addition, the international community has to take action and to protect the civilians.
bleu: În acelasi timp, tari precum Turcia, Qatar, Arabia Saudita și tarile occidentale care asigura o acoperire pentru terorism, ca Franta, Statele Unite sau altele, nu pot lupta impotriva terorismului.

translation.en: You cannot be against terrorism and fight terrorism at the same time.
translation.ro: Nu poti fi cu și impotriva terorismului în acelasi timp.

target: Nu poti fi cu și impotriva terorismului în acelasi timp.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: You cannot be against terrorism and fight terrorism at the same time.
bleu: Nu poti fi cu și impotriva terorismului în acelasi timp.

translation.en: "But if these countries decide to change their policies and realize that terrorism is a scorpion - if you put in your pocket, it will sting you - then we have no objection in cooperating with all these countries, since it is a real coalition not a fake one, which fights against terrorism, ", said the leader in Damascus.
translation.ro: "Insa daca aceste tari decid sa-și schimbe politicile și realizeaza ca terorismul este ca un scorpion - daca il pui în buzunar, te va intepa -, atunci nu avem nicio obiectie în a coopera cu toate aceste tari, avand în vedere ca este o coalitie reala și nu falsa, care sa lupte impotriva terorismului", a mai declarat liderul de la Damasc.

target: "Insa daca aceste tari decid sa-și schimbe politicile și realizeaza ca terorismul este ca un scorpion - daca il pui în buzunar, te va intepa -, atunci nu avem nicio obiectie în a coopera cu toate aceste tari, avand în vedere ca este o coalitie reala și nu falsa, care sa lupte impotriva terorismului", a mai declarat liderul de la Damasc.

translation.en: The weather will be pretty warm on Wednesday, especially in the West of the country, where temperatures will pass 30 degrees.

resps: In other parts of the country the temperature will be between 25 and 29 degrees. In the South, where the heat wave will continue, the temperature will be over 30 degrees, and in some areas it might reach 35 degrees.
In the East, the warm weather will be accompanied by humidity.

translation.en: The collapse of oil prices caused great losses last year to the workers in oil production, shareholders of energy companies and countries heavily dependent on this resource.
translation.ro: Prabusirea cotatiei petrolului a provocat pierderi mari în ultimul an muncitorilor în extractia titeiului, actionarilor companiilor energetice și tarilor care depind foarte mult de aceasta resursa.

target: Prabusirea cotatiei petrolului a provocat pierderi mari în ultimul an muncitorilor în extractia titeiului, actionarilor companiilor energetice și tarilor care depind foarte mult de aceasta resursa.

translation.en: A map compiled by Bloomberg shows that during October 2014 - July 2015 in nearly all the 76 countries considered, fuel prices have decreased.
translation.ro: O harta compilata de Bloomberg arata ca, în perioada octombrie 2014 - iulie 2015, în aproape toate cele 76 de tari luate în calcul, pretul combustibilului a scazut.

target: O harta compilata de Bloomberg arata ca, în perioada octombrie 2014 - iulie 2015, în aproape toate cele 76 de tari luate în calcul, pretul combustibilului a scazut.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: A map compiled by Bloomberg shows that during October 2014 - July 2015 in nearly all the 76 countries considered, fuel prices have decreased.
resps: The only exceptions are Romania and Hungary, where the price of fuel increased by 7.5% and 2.5%, respectively.
A decrease in fuel prices was recorded everywhere except in Romania, Serbia and Macedonia, where prices have risen by 12.9%, 1.6% and 1.5%, respectively.

resps: It is based on the average price of the state and the exchange rate of the local currency on January 1, 2018.
With these numbers, the average price of a house in Romania is $94,800, while the average price of a house in the US is $230,000.

target: Situatia din Romania
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The situation in Romania
resps: is extremely complicated. The government has been paralyzed for several months. The political parties have been unable to reach a consensus on any issues. The economy is stagnant and unemployment is high. Corruption is rampant and the legal system is inefficient. The health care system is in crisis and the education system is in decline. The infrastructure is deteriorating and the environment is being polluted. The population is demoralized and the country is on the brink of chaos.

translation.en: German Chancellor Angela Merkel promised Tuesday night that the federal government will further support the 16 States of the federation in receiving and distributing tens of thousands of migrants who enter the country via southern Europe.

translation.en: A murder of an extraordinary sadism terrified the residents of Târgu Frumos and Roman.
translation.ro: O crimă de un sadism ieșit din comun a îngrozit locuitorii din Târgu Frumos și Roman.

translation.en: Yesterday morning, in the early hours, the merchants of Târgu Frumos were the witnesses of terrifying scenes in the square outside the main entrance.
translation.ro: Ieri dimineață, la primele ore ale zilei, piețarii din Târgu Frumos au putut vedea scene terifiante lângă intrarea principală în piață.

target: Ieri dimineață, la primele ore ale zilei, piețarii din Târgu Frumos au putut vedea scene terifiante lângă intrarea principală în piață.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Yesterday morning, in the early hours, the merchants of Târgu Frumos were the witnesses of terrifying scenes in the square outside the main entrance.
resps: They told us that suddenly, without any warning, the square was filled with a horrible smell. In the same moment, there appeared a large cloud of black smoke, which quickly spread to the surrounding area. It is not known what caused such a strange explosion, but those who were closest to the scene told us that they saw a man, dressed in a long, gray cloak, standing in the center of the smoke, which seemed to be coming from his body. The man looked around for a few moments, then disappeared as quickly as he had appeared.
A caravan on its way to Neamț was attacked, and the merchants traveling in it were robbed of all their goods.
bleu: Ieri dimineață, la primele ore ale zilei, piețarii din Târgu Frumos au putut vedea scene terifiante lângă intrarea principală în piață.

translation.en: He recounts that on the night of Monday to Tuesday, he was waiting as usual for the arrival of the regular coaches which transited the town.
translation.ro: Acesta povestește că, în noaptea de luni spre marți, aștepta ca de obicei sosirea autocarelor care tranzitează regulat localitatea.

target: Acesta povestește că, în noaptea de luni spre marți, aștepta ca de obicei sosirea autocarelor care tranzitează regulat localitatea.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: He recounts that on the night of Monday to Tuesday, he was waiting as usual for the arrival of the regular coaches which transited the town.
resps: The passengers were mostly workers who were returning home after the day’s work. But this time, there was a surprise in store for him. He noticed a woman in the group of passengers waiting at the bus stop. She was dressed in a skirt and a blouse and wore a large hat and she was leaning on a crutch. He was immediately struck by her beauty and her elegance, for she looked like an aristocrat. When the bus arrived, she boarded it, and he also got on. But he did not have the courage to speak to her. She had her seat by the window, and he found himself sitting opposite her. They were the only passengers in the bus. He stole glances at her, and she looked at him, too, but they did not start a conversation. When the bus arrived in front of the house where he lived, he got off, turned round and saw that she was also getting off. She walked with difficulty, and he approached her. She looked at him and smiled.

resps: I've been in bad situations before, but this was very intense. When you can't breathe, it's really bad. I used my shirt to cover my nose. Then, I tried to open my window. Thankfully, it opened a little, and I was able to breathe a bit. I was thinking about what to do. I tried to calm down. I was thinking, 'Okay, there's got to be a solution here.' I decided to drive myself out of this place. I don't think I've ever driven so fast. I was speeding. I didn't care. I just wanted out of there. I'm not sure how, but I did make it out. It was a miracle. I felt like I had been given a new chance. Now, I'm just happy to be alive.

translation.en: The man's name was Gheorghe Zaharia, and was a reserve officer.
translation.ro: Bărbatul se numea Gheorghe Zaharia, și era ofițer în rezervă.

target: Bărbatul se numea Gheorghe Zaharia, și era ofițer în rezervă.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The man's name was Gheorghe Zaharia, and was a reserve officer.
resps: He was born in Caracal, on June 14, 1941. He graduated from the Military School of Engineers in Bucharest in 1963. He served in the same school as a mathematics teacher until 1968, when he was appointed as a senior engineer in the Department of the Territorial Troops. In 1972, he was promoted to the rank of captain and was appointed as the head of the Department of the Territorial Troops. In 1976, he was promoted to the rank of major and was appointed as the deputy chief of the Department of the Territorial Troops. In 1980, he was promoted to the rank of lieutenant colonel and was appointed as the chief of the Department of the Territorial Troops. He held this position until 1985, when he was promoted to the rank of colonel and was appointed as the deputy chief of the General Staff of the Romanian Army. In 1989, he was promoted to the rank of major general and was appointed as the chief of the General Staff of the Romanian Army. He held this position until his retirement in 19
bleu: Bărbatul se numea Gheorghe Zaharia, și era ofițer în rezervă.

resps: She was very happy, she was returning home. She had been away for so long. She was looking forward to seeing her parents and little sister. They were going to be so happy. As she was approaching the terminal, she saw him. She had not seen him for years. He looked just the same. They lived in the same town, but he was a lot older. She could not believe her eyes. She was so excited. She had so much to tell him.

She gets on the coach at 21:30 and arrives in Iași at 10:30. She gets off the coach and goes to her home, which is near the train station. She lives with her parents. She always sleeps well after a long journey. The day after, she wakes up early again, has a quick breakfast, and goes to work.
bleu: Alaltăseară, a mai transportat unul, apoi s-a hotărât în ce direcție să meargă, și a ales autocarul București - Iași.

translation.en: The City Hall took over the national roads in the municipality, after they had been taken over by the Government years ago to be asphalted with money from the national budget during the 2004 electoral campaign.
translation.ro: Primăria a preluat drumurile naționale de pe raza municipiului, după ce cu ani în urmă acestea fuseseră preluate de Guvern, pentru a putea fi asfaltate cu bani de la bugetul național, în campania electorală din 2004.

target: Primăria a preluat drumurile naționale de pe raza municipiului, după ce cu ani în urmă acestea fuseseră preluate de Guvern, pentru a putea fi asfaltate cu bani de la bugetul național, în campania electorală din 2004.

translation.en: The decision was enacted yesterday by the Local Council (LC), and in order for it to be implemented a Government Resolution is needed.
translation.ro: Decizia a fost adoptată ieri de către Consiliul Local (CL), iar pentru a putea fi aplicată trebuie o hotărâre a Guvernului.

target: Decizia a fost adoptată ieri de către Consiliul Local (CL), iar pentru a putea fi aplicată trebuie o hotărâre a Guvernului.

translation.en: Some sources say that the transfer of the management right from the Regional Directorate of National Roads was a condition for that institution to grant approval for the General Urban Plan (GUP).
translation.ro: Unele surse spun că transferul dreptului de administrare de la Direcția Regională a Drumurilor Naționale era o con­diție pentru că această în­stituție să acorde avizul pentru Planul Ur­banistic General (PUG).

target: Unele surse spun că transferul dreptului de administrare de la Direcția Regională a Drumurilor Naționale era o con­diție pentru că această în­stituție să acorde avizul pentru Planul Ur­banistic General (PUG).
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Some sources say that the transfer of the management right from the Regional Directorate of National Roads was a condition for that institution to grant approval for the General Urban Plan (GUP).
resps: This is only partially true. In fact, the transfer of the management right from the Regional Directorate of National Roads was not previously required by the institution to grant approval for the GUP. However, in practice, the Regional Directorate of National Roads had previously requested this condition for the approval of the GUP.

translation.en: Continuing the description of some sheets in the youthful political sympathies "file" of Mircea Eliade which, as briefly as they are presented, exceed the size of a newspaper article and must be disseminated as a series, I think the friendship between Radu Gyr and Mircea Eliade deserves to be evoked, one of the most vehement counts used by the detractors of the great Romanian scholar.
translation.ro: În continuarea descrierii unor file din "dosarul" simpatiilor politice de tinerețe ale lui Mircea Eliade care, oricât de condensat ar fi prezentate exced dimensiunea unui articol de cotidian și trebuie difuzate în serial, merită, cred, evocată prietenia dintre Radu Gyr și Mircea Eliade, unul dintre cele mai vehemente capete de acuzare utilizat de detractorii marelui savant român.

translation.en: Prizonierul istoriei (The prisoner of history) (Bucharest, 2003), is another hypothesis we are very interested in because we want to understand the resumption of the epistolary contacts between Radu Gyr and Eliade in 1968, after Ceausescu had played the "balcony scene" in August of that year.
translation.ro: Prizonierul istoriei (București, 2003), o altă ipoteză, care ne interesează în cel mai înalt grad în înțelegerea reluării contactelor epistolare dintre Radu Gyr și Eliade în 1968, după ce jucase Ceaușescu "scena balconului" din august acel an.

target: Prizonierul istoriei (București, 2003), o altă ipoteză, care ne interesează în cel mai înalt grad în înțelegerea reluării contactelor epistolare dintre Radu Gyr și Eliade în 1968, după ce jucase Ceaușescu "scena balconului" din august acel an.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Prizonierul istoriei (The prisoner of history) (Bucharest, 2003), is another hypothesis we are very interested in because we want to understand the resumption of the epistolary contacts between Radu Gyr and Eliade in 1968, after Ceausescu had played the "balcony scene" in August of that year.
resps: In the book mentioned above, Eliade wrote, "I have not replied to Radu Gyr. I have no intention to deceive him, to pretend that I forgot about him or that I have rejected him. I want to tell him that I don't know how to answer to his letters and that I cannot see him. I don't want to invent any pretexts which might make us ill at ease and which would put an end to our affectionate relationship. I have to wait for a sign from him, which will be decisive. I must know whether our friendship is still alive or is it just a memory. [...] I cannot imagine that he would deny me this friendship."19

In this context, Gyr's letter to Eliade (August 27, 1968) is of particular interest. It is written in the spirit of a "new beginning" and contains a veiled message about the need to re-examine the events of 1945 and even to put them in a new light, from the perspective of the new, post-communist era (Gyr, 1968, 11). Gyr's expression of his desire to continue his collaboration with Eliade is also veiled: "Continuăm legătura epistolară, de pildă, ce vrei să mai discutăm?" ("Let's continue our epistolary correspondence, for instance, what else would you like to discuss?") (11).

I don't want to invent any pretexts which might make us ill at ease and which would put an end to our affectionate relationship. I have to wait for a sign from him, which will be decisive. I must know whether our friendship is still alive or is it just a memory. [...] I cannot imagine that he would deny me this friendship."19

I must know whether our friendship is still alive or is it just a memory. [...] I cannot imagine that he would deny me this friendship."19

Prizonierul istoriei (București, 2003), o altă ipoteză, care ne interesează în cel mai înalt grad în înțelegerea reluării contactelor epistolare dintre Radu Gyr și Eliade în 1968, după ce jucase Ceaușescu "scena balconului" din august acel an.

translation.en: Relying on documents signed by Radu Gyr after he was pressured during the Security Police investigation in 1941, the documents kept in the Romanian Intelligence Service archives today (FD, file 573, F.15) and a prosecution note from 1938, Florin Țurcanu says that "Eliade will not join their group, but the so-called "legionary family" called Luminita (The light), a group of intellectuals, especially writers, led by poet Radu Gyr".
translation.ro: Bazându-se pe documentele semnate de Radu Gyr sub presiune, în timpul anchetei la Siguranță, în 1941, documente păstrate azi în arhiva SRI (FD, Dosarul 573, f.15) precum și pe o notă de urmărire din 1938, Florin Țurcanu afirmă că "Eliade nu va intra în grupul lor, ci în așa zisa "familie legionară" numită Luminița, o grupare de "cuiburi" de intelectuali, mai ales scriitori, conduși de poetul Radu Gyr".

target: Bazându-se pe documentele semnate de Radu Gyr sub presiune, în timpul anchetei la Siguranță, în 1941, documente păstrate azi în arhiva SRI (FD, Dosarul 573, f.15) precum și pe o notă de urmărire din 1938, Florin Țurcanu afirmă că "Eliade nu va intra în grupul lor, ci în așa zisa "familie legionară" numită Luminița, o grupare de "cuiburi" de intelectuali, mai ales scriitori, conduși de poetul Radu Gyr".
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Relying on documents signed by Radu Gyr after he was pressured during the Security Police investigation in 1941, the documents kept in the Romanian Intelligence Service archives today (FD, file 573, F.15) and a prosecution note from 1938, Florin Țurcanu says that "Eliade will not join their group, but the so-called "legionary family" called Luminita (The light), a group of intellectuals, especially writers, led by poet Radu Gyr".
resps: This group was dedicated to the "educational activity" of the Legionary Movement. However, Țurcanu does not mention any English document as source. Here, one can only notice a confusion of terms. There is no trace of any "Luminita" group in the documents in the Romanian Intelligence Service archives, but there is a "Luminism" group, which is mentioned in legionary documents and in the notes of the Security Police investigation in 1941, as well as in the book by Țurcanu himself. The confusion is even greater in the fact that Radu Gyr was not a leader of the "Luminism" group, but merely a member. The "Luminism" group was led by Petre Țuțea, and its members were Radu Gyr, Nichita Stănescu, Dan Hăulică, Ștefan Augustin Doinaș, Constantin Noica and others. There is no trace of Mircea Eliade in any of these documents. This error is also made by Romanian historians such as Paul Cernăuțeanu, who in the book *Istoria Secur
[119] This is not reflected in the 1941 document signed by Gyr, which makes no mention of Eliade or the "Luminita" group.[110]
