translation.en: Because there are no verifiable data regarding the Luminita nest, those that were exiled considered that the existence of this "legionary family" was questionable. What needs to be discussed is the context in which this information was recorded on file.
translation.ro: Cum despre cuibul Luminița nu există nici un fel de date verificabile, cei din exil considerând existența acestei "familii legionare" discutabilă, ceea ce trebuie pus în discuție e, până la urma contextul în care această informație a fost înregistrată la dosar.

target: Cum despre cuibul Luminița nu există nici un fel de date verificabile, cei din exil considerând existența acestei "familii legionare" discutabilă, ceea ce trebuie pus în discuție e, până la urma contextul în care această informație a fost înregistrată la dosar.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Because there are no verifiable data regarding the Luminita nest, those that were exiled considered that the existence of this "legionary family" was questionable. What needs to be discussed is the context in which this information was recorded on file.
resps: As mentioned above, the data was found in the files of the people who were exiled to Bărăgan from Bucharest, during the period 1951-1956. This group of exiles was made up of the members of the Legionary Movement and of their families. Moreover, it should be mentioned that the data regarding the Luminita nest was found in the files of those who were exiled on the basis of the decree of 21 October 1949, which included those who were condemned by the People's Tribunals (1945-1949) and those who were condemned by the Military Tribunals (1944-1949) for political reasons.

The term "legionary family" was seen with suspicion in the Antonescu regime. The "legionaries" were prosecuted as criminals, and their movement was banned. Those who were exiled to Romania were considered suspect, and their political activities were restricted. Therefore, it is highly unlikely that they would have openly claimed to be legionaries.
bleu: Cum despre cuibul Luminița nu există nici un fel de date verificabile, cei din exil considerând existența acestei "familii legionare" discutabilă, ceea ce trebuie pus în discuție e, până la urma contextul în care această informație a fost înregistrată la dosar.

translation.en: Leaving aside the surprising kindness of the Romanian Intelligence Service to provide Mr. Țurcanu with secret files, the most obvious thing is that, at the time, the target of the Security Police was "commander" Radu Gyr. Eliade was mentioned in the note of 21 March 1938, in the context in which Armand Calinescu, the Minister of the Interior was given free hand to take all necessary measures so that king Carol could be able to impose royal dictatorship, suspending parliamentary life and eliminating the main political force of the Legionaries which started to receive an unexpected popularity (the "Totul pentru țară" (anything for the country) party ranked number 3 in the elections of 1937).
translation.ro: Lăsând la o parte surprinzătoarea amabilitate a SRI-ului de a-i pune la dispoziție aceste dosare secrete domnului Țurcanu, e mai mult decât evident faptul că, la acea vreme, ținta urmăririi Siguranței era "comandantul" Radu Gyr, menționarea lui Eliade făcându-se, conform notei din 21 martie 1938, în contextul în care Armand Călinescu, ministrul de Interne primise mână liberă să ia toate măsurile necesare pentru ca regele Carol să-și poată impune Dictatura regală, suspendând viața parlamentară și eliminind principala forță politică a legionarilor care începea să se bucure de o neașteptată popularitate (Partidul Totul pentru țară ieșise al treilea în alegerile din 1937).

target: Lăsând la o parte surprinzătoarea amabilitate a SRI-ului de a-i pune la dispoziție aceste dosare secrete domnului Țurcanu, e mai mult decât evident faptul că, la acea vreme, ținta urmăririi Siguranței era "comandantul" Radu Gyr, menționarea lui Eliade făcându-se, conform notei din 21 martie 1938, în contextul în care Armand Călinescu, ministrul de Interne primise mână liberă să ia toate măsurile necesare pentru ca regele Carol să-și poată impune Dictatura regală, suspendând viața parlamentară și eliminind principala forță politică a legionarilor care începea să se bucure de o neașteptată popularitate (Partidul Totul pentru țară ieșise al treilea în alegerile din 1937).
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Leaving aside the surprising kindness of the Romanian Intelligence Service to provide Mr. Țurcanu with secret files, the most obvious thing is that, at the time, the target of the Security Police was "commander" Radu Gyr. Eliade was mentioned in the note of 21 March 1938, in the context in which Armand Calinescu, the Minister of the Interior was given free hand to take all necessary measures so that king Carol could be able to impose royal dictatorship, suspending parliamentary life and eliminating the main political force of the Legionaries which started to receive an unexpected popularity (the "Totul pentru țară" (anything for the country) party ranked number 3 in the elections of 1937).
resps: The note of 21 March 1938 mentions that the Security Police had detected the existence of a Legionaries group of students and young teachers, led by Radu Gyr, which has the purpose of preparing a violent action against the king.

The elimination of the Legionary movement had the nature of a purging, which would extend in a short time over the entire political spectrum, from the Left to the extreme-Right forces, which in fact were the only ones having a strong popular base. The "National Christian" Romanian state was beginning to take a shape in the spirit of King Carol, with the "obligation" of having to purge the political class of all elements considered to be "unfit" for the new national-Romanian project. The Legionary movement was the first force to be "purged", and it was followed by the other political forces, including the Iron Guard.

The note ends with the following paragraph: "The king has the intention to eliminate the above-mentioned leaders so that the Legionary Movement will not have any more commanders of its own, and he will leave the leadership to a person who will be able to be a good intermediary between the Legionary Movement and the royal house."
filtered_resps: The note of 21 March 1938 mentions that the Security Police had detected the existence of a Legionaries group of students and young teachers, led by Radu Gyr, which has the purpose of preparing a violent action against the king.
bleu: The note of 21 March 1938 mentions that the Security Police had detected the existence of a Legionaries group of students and young teachers, led by Radu Gyr, which has the purpose of preparing a violent action against the king.

Lăsând la o parte surprinzătoarea amabilitate a SRI-ului de a-i pune la dispoziție aceste dosare secrete domnului Țurcanu, e mai mult decât evident faptul că, la acea vreme, ținta urmăririi Siguranței era "comandantul" Radu Gyr, menționarea lui Eliade făcându-se, conform notei din 21 martie 1938, în contextul în care Armand Călinescu, ministrul de Interne primise mână liberă să ia toate măsurile necesare pentru ca regele Carol să-și poată impune Dictatura regală, suspendând viața parlamentară și eliminind principala forță politică a legionarilor care începea să se bucure de o neașteptată popularitate (Partidul Totul pentru țară ieșise al treilea în alegerile din 1937).

translation.en: Eliade's arrest was made as a result of this note, cited by Țurcanu : "Mircea Eliade, writer and journalist, registered in the legionary movement in 1935 in the group of writers and poets under the leadership of Professor Radu Demetrescu Gyr".
translation.ro: Arestarea lui Eliade a fost realizată ca urmare a acestei note, citată de Țurcanu: "Eliad Mircea, scriitor și ziarist, încadrat în Mișcarea legionară în anul 1935 în grupul scriitorilor și poeților de sub conducerea profesorului Radu Demetrescu Gyr".

target: Arestarea lui Eliade a fost realizată ca urmare a acestei note, citată de Țurcanu: "Eliad Mircea, scriitor și ziarist, încadrat în Mișcarea legionară în anul 1935 în grupul scriitorilor și poeților de sub conducerea profesorului Radu Demetrescu Gyr".
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Eliade's arrest was made as a result of this note, cited by Țurcanu : "Mircea Eliade, writer and journalist, registered in the legionary movement in 1935 in the group of writers and poets under the leadership of Professor Radu Demetrescu Gyr".
resps: The defendant was not able to prove that this accusation was false. To the question of the President whether he was a Legionnaire, he responded affirmatively, but he added that he had not held any important position in the movement. In his defense, Eliade stated that he had been a member of the Legion of the Archangel Michael and added: "I have never been impressed by the legionary movement, but I have always considered its founder, Corneliu Zelea Codreanu, to be a social phenomenon worthy of interest. I have never mixed with the Legion, and I have never held any position of responsibility within it, and the fact that, between 1935 and 1937, I knew a group of young people who were members of the Legion is a simple fact which, in itself, cannot bear witness to a political attitude. I have not been a Legionnaire in any other sense, not even in a simple sense, and I think that the fact that I have written in *Buna Vestire* does not make me a Legionnaire."
In the note, Țurcanu also claims that Eliade was a member of the legionary organization.
bleu: Arestarea lui Eliade a fost realizată ca urmare a acestei note, citată de Țurcanu: "Eliad Mircea, scriitor și ziarist, încadrat în Mișcarea legionară în anul 1935 în grupul scriitorilor și poeților de sub conducerea profesorului Radu Demetrescu Gyr".

translation.en: As for me, I see this note as a thin bureaucratic cover for the repression of 1938 and is likely that such superficial notes have been made hastily for the great majority of the Legionaries or active public supporters who had to be arrested, but also had to be tied to an important legionnaire leader.
translation.ro: În ce mă privește, eu văd această notă ca o acoperire birocratică subțire pentru represiunea din 1938 și e probabil ca astfel de note superficiale să fi fost făcute la repezeală pentru marea majoritate a legionarilor sau simpatizanților activi în spațiul public care trebuiau arestați, dar care trebuiau legați de un lider legionar important.

target: În ce mă privește, eu văd această notă ca o acoperire birocratică subțire pentru represiunea din 1938 și e probabil ca astfel de note superficiale să fi fost făcute la repezeală pentru marea majoritate a legionarilor sau simpatizanților activi în spațiul public care trebuiau arestați, dar care trebuiau legați de un lider legionar important.

translation.en: Once Radu Gyr was in custody in February 1941, after the suppression of the legionary rebellion, he wrote the statement mentioned above, which merely confirms the first retrospective method of banal bureaucratic cover in any policing, authoritarian regime.
translation.ro: Declarația olografă a lui Radu Gyr amintită mai sus, dată în arest, în februarie 1941, după înăbușirea rebeliunii legionare, nu face decât să o confirme retrospectiv pe prima, metoda banală de acoperire birocratică în orice regim polițienesc, autoritar.

target: Declarația olografă a lui Radu Gyr amintită mai sus, dată în arest, în februarie 1941, după înăbușirea rebeliunii legionare, nu face decât să o confirme retrospectiv pe prima, metoda banală de acoperire birocratică în orice regim polițienesc, autoritar.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Once Radu Gyr was in custody in February 1941, after the suppression of the legionary rebellion, he wrote the statement mentioned above, which merely confirms the first retrospective method of banal bureaucratic cover in any policing, authoritarian regime.
resps: It was stated that on October 29, 1940, Gyr met with General Ioan Topor and Captain Nicolae Cristescu, and that he was told of the then'secret' plan to remove the Conducator, Ion Antonescu, from power, and that he was asked to sign off on the plan and to admit the responsibility for its execution by the Iron Guard. Gyr also explained that he had not signed the plan because he had not agreed with it and had not intended to execute it, even if it had been signed. He also mentioned that he had had a meeting with the legionary leader, Horia Sima, in which they had talked about the'secret plan', and that Horia Sima had asked him if he would support the Iron Guard in a situation where it had assumed power after Antonescu's fall. Gyr admitted that he had agreed to support the Iron Guard, but that he had not made any commitments about the means of exercising that support. The statement concluded that Gyr had not conspired against Antonescu and had not intended to support the Iron Guard if it had seized power in any way other than through elections. (Crampton,

When one writes a statement, one generally thinks about what the authority expects to hear. Gyr's statement, however, also shows that the subjective interpretation is not always objective, but it can also be influenced by language. Gyr writes that he was "engaged in the organization of the Legionary Movement in Transylvania." But this does not mean that he was a leader of the Legionary Movement in Transylvania, as is often said. He was a member and wrote the statement in Romanian, a language that he did not master, which is why he is responsible for the mistakes in the statement. Romanian "engagement" is German "Einsatz," which can be translated as "use" or "deployment." The direct translation of the term in English is "use." Gyr was not directly responsible for the organization of the Legionary Movement in Transylvania, but he was used for that purpose. He was not the leader of the Legionary Movement in Transylvania, but he was its representative.
bleu: Declarația olografă a lui Radu Gyr amintită mai sus, dată în arest, în februarie 1941, după înăbușirea rebeliunii legionare, nu face decât să o confirme retrospectiv pe prima, metoda banală de acoperire birocratică în orice regim polițienesc, autoritar.

translation.en: We are talking about an equivocation, just as when using the term "member" of the Movement, known only by someone who knows the composition of the internal structures of this radical organization based on a religious foundation which is a preceding, trial stage in which the one at issue behaves as an active sympathizer in the probation period of three years before becoming a fledged "comrade".
translation.ro: E aici un echivoc, la fel ca și în cazul folosirii termenului de "membru" al Mișcării, pe care numai cineva care cunoaște alcătuirea structurilor interne ale acestei organizații radicale bazată pe un fundament religios știe că el reprezintă un stadiu premergător, de probă, în care cel în cauză se comportă ca un simpatizant activ, aflat în perioada de încercare de trei ani înainte de a deveni "camarad" cu acte în regulă.

translation.en: Also, all these secondary forms of organization like intellectual clubs or circles, social gatherings, discussion groups with the peasants, youth and student organizations revolved around a nest. The people in these groups were families, not the nest itself as a cohesive form of political organization and action.
translation.ro: De asemenea, toate aceste forme de organizare secundare precum cluburile sau cenaclurile intelectuale, șezătorile, grupurile de discuție cu țăranii, organizațiile tinerilor sau studenților gravitau în jurul unui cuib, erau "familia" lui, nu erau cuibul propriu zis, ca formă închegată de organizare politică și de acțiune.

resps: The nest was the primary form of organization and action, but the people in the nest were not usually members of other, more secondary forms of political organization. The nest was a primary form of organization and action, not a secondary form of organization and action.
It was the families that got together to discuss local issues and decide on common actions.

resps: The term "faction" is also misleading, since the word "faction" normally implies a small group of people who are in conflict with other factions within the same group. The term "nest" is used in a way which is not standard in the English language. The word "nest" is used in Romanian language to designate a group of people associated with the Iron Guard. However, the English word "nest" is a metaphor, which is not used in English to designate a political group, but only in a non-political context, to designate a group of animals. The translation of the word "nest" as "faction" does not do justice to the Romanian language term, but also does not facilitate an adequate understanding of the phenomenon.

| | In October, 1936, the Captain prepared to return to the front lines of the Spanish Civil War. He had been relieved of his command in the Foreign Legion by General Franco (then in charge of the Nationalist army) because of his differences with Franco's political and military policies, and the Captain faced the possibility of never again being allowed to participate in battle. He was at this time in the hospital, recovering from an injury he had received on the front lines. It was then that I was invited to visit him in the hospital, and during our conversation he mentioned the possibility that he might never again be allowed to return to the battlefield. I was stunned, and I found the words to express my feelings with great difficulty. I did not know what to say, but I would have liked to say something like this: "Your decision to return to the front lines is the greatest proof of your courage. If you don't go back, you will not be able to look into the eyes of your subordinates. You have taught them to fight, and you can't abandon them now that they are fighting for a cause which is yours as well. But if you return to the front lines,

translation.en: Public support of a cause you believe in does not necessarily mean the actual political enrolment especially since, as a rule, this kind of intellectuals have a kind of superiority in comparison to the actual activists and join the politics only when they are directly offered the highest privileges.
translation.ro: Susținerea publică a unei cauze în care crezi nu înseamnă însă, în mod necesar, și înregimentarea politică propriu zisă cu atât mai mult cu cât, de regulă, intelectuali de talia asta conservă un tip de superioritate fața de activiștii ca atare și nu intră în politică decât când li se oferă direct înalte privilegii.

translation.en: As much as I was able to form an opinion about the type of Eliade's thinking at that time, when he was the "leader of the young generation," I find it hard to believe that he could have accepted the hierarchical rigors of a legionary nest.
translation.ro: Atât cât mi-am putut forma o părere despre tipul de gândire al lui Eliade din acea perioada, în care era "liderul tinerei generații", îmi vine greu să cred că ar fi acceptat rigorile ierarhice dintr-un cuib legionar.

target: Atât cât mi-am putut forma o părere despre tipul de gândire al lui Eliade din acea perioada, în care era "liderul tinerei generații", îmi vine greu să cred că ar fi acceptat rigorile ierarhice dintr-un cuib legionar.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: As much as I was able to form an opinion about the type of Eliade's thinking at that time, when he was the "leader of the young generation," I find it hard to believe that he could have accepted the hierarchical rigors of a legionary nest.
resps: If he did so, he was much more a victim than a collaborator. I am convinced that Eliade had a more profound sense of life, a much more complex and even intransigent personality.
bleu: Atât cât mi-am putut forma o părere despre tipul de gândire al lui Eliade din acea perioada, în care era "liderul tinerei generații", îmi vine greu să cred că ar fi acceptat rigorile ierarhice dintr-un cuib legionar.

translation.en: And Radu Gyr's intellectual ascendancy was not comparable to that of Nae Ionescu, though!
translation.ro: Iar Radu Gyr nu avea ascendentul intelectual al lui Nae Ionescu, totuși!

target: Iar Radu Gyr nu avea ascendentul intelectual al lui Nae Ionescu, totuși!

translation.en: Not to mention that every legionnaire "file's" main element is the anti-Semitic and violent public activity, both worthy of being stigmatized, non-existent in case of Eliade, at least until proven otherwise.
translation.ro: Pentru a nu mai pomeni, decât în treacăt, faptul că, în orice "dosar" legionar, ceea ce primează este activitatea publică antisemită precum și violența, ambele demne de a fi stigmatizate, inexistente însă în cazul lui Eliade, până la noi probe.

translation.en: As for the correspondence between Eliade and Gyr between 1968 - 1969, Mircea Handoca, an enthusiastic defender of Eliade, tries to penalize the statements of Florin Țurcanu (based however on some archive documents, even if they should have been seriously dissected and contextualized) with a questionable argument.
translation.ro: În ceea ce privește corespondența Eliade-Gyr dintre 1968 - 1969, Mircea Handoca, un entuziast apărător al lui Eliade, încearcă să sancționeze afirmațiile lui Florin Țurcanu (bazate totuși pe niște documente de arhivă, chiar dacă ar fi meritat disecate și contextualizate mai serios) cu un argument totuși discutabil.

target: În ceea ce privește corespondența Eliade-Gyr dintre 1968 - 1969, Mircea Handoca, un entuziast apărător al lui Eliade, încearcă să sancționeze afirmațiile lui Florin Țurcanu (bazate totuși pe niște documente de arhivă, chiar dacă ar fi meritat disecate și contextualizate mai serios) cu un argument totuși discutabil.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: As for the correspondence between Eliade and Gyr between 1968 - 1969, Mircea Handoca, an enthusiastic defender of Eliade, tries to penalize the statements of Florin Țurcanu (based however on some archive documents, even if they should have been seriously dissected and contextualized) with a questionable argument.
resps: He says that in the letters of Eliade and Gyr "there are many places where they talk about the need for Romanians to study the West, to understand the Westerners, to have a deeper knowledge of the history of Western philosophy, to become familiar with the Western culture in general and not to confuse it with the Western civilization."

He argues that the letters between Eliade and Gyr were re-written in English by the two authors, meaning that they were not written in the original languages (Eliade in Romanian and Gyr in German), and that they were written after the correspondence published in the volume Eliade, Mircea, Correspondenta lui Mircea Eliade cu Carl Alfred Meier, 1962 - 1976, ediție îngrijită și prefață de Mircea Handoca, București, Editura Humanitas, 1999. The first argument is true, but it does not imply a particular problem or a particular value of the text. The fact that a text was re-written in English is not relevant if this text was not written in the original languages; and moreover, no one has ever said that the correspondence was written originally in English. The second argument is false, since the correspondence was concluded in 1969, whereas the published volume of the correspondence between Eliade and Meier, which was also written in English, was concluded in 1976.

After having presented the ‘dispute’ between Eliade and Țurcanu in a few lines, Handoca writes that ‘the same Țurcanu was the one who, in 1989, had the courage to criticize the regime, to defend the Revolution, and to fight for the freedom of the press’ (p. 26). Eliade’s reaction (‘Why are you talking about this now?’) is, however, more than justified. What does the revolutionary courage of Țurcanu in 1989 have to do with the critical analysis of the correspondence between Eliade and Gyr in 1968 - 1969? Is it a case of defamation by association, or rather of the ‘ad hominem’ fallacy? In other words, the question that one should ask here is: what does the character of Țurcanu and his actions in 1989 have to do with the critical analysis of the exchange of letters between Eliade and Gyr in 1968 - 1969? In a different way, one can say that the argument of Handoca is invalid, for it does not

He puts forward that Gyr sent a letter in 1968 to Eliade in which he mentioned that Florin Țurcanu would work in Paris with Gyr as interpreter, something that Mircea Handoca presents as an argument against the accusations of Florin Țurcanu. However, when Mircea Handoca mentions this fact, he does not provide any source, nor does he put forward that Gyr, indeed, requested the help of a Romanian interpreter. He does not mention that the letter was written by Gyr on 13 December 1968, but that the letter was only received by Eliade on 23 May 1969.
filtered_resps: He says that in the letters of Eliade and Gyr "there are many places where they talk about the need for Romanians to study the West, to understand the Westerners, to have a deeper knowledge of the history of Western philosophy, to become familiar with the Western culture in general and not to confuse it with the Western civilization."
bleu: He says that in the letters of Eliade and Gyr "there are many places where they talk about the need for Romanians to study the West, to understand the Westerners, to have a deeper knowledge of the history of Western philosophy, to become familiar with the Western culture in general and not to confuse it with the Western civilization."

În ceea ce privește corespondența Eliade-Gyr dintre 1968 - 1969, Mircea Handoca, un entuziast apărător al lui Eliade, încearcă să sancționeze afirmațiile lui Florin Țurcanu (bazate totuși pe niște documente de arhivă, chiar dacă ar fi meritat disecate și contextualizate mai serios) cu un argument totuși discutabil.

translation.en: In his volume "Noi glose asupra lui Mircea Eliade" (Bucharest, 2006), Mircea Handoca finds that "no line in the correspondence between Mircea Eliade and Radu Gyr contains any allusion that would support that classification."

translation.en: When Radu Gyr somehow managed to be released alive from the communist mines in 1968, he couldn't risk making any allusions in his letters, as they were obviously intercepted by the censorship.
translation.ro: Nici nu avea cum în 1968, când, ieșit oarecum viu din ocnele comuniste, Radu Gyr nu ar fi putut risca vreo aluzie într-o scrisoare care, evident, era interceptată de cenzură.

target: Nici nu avea cum în 1968, când, ieșit oarecum viu din ocnele comuniste, Radu Gyr nu ar fi putut risca vreo aluzie într-o scrisoare care, evident, era interceptată de cenzură.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: When Radu Gyr somehow managed to be released alive from the communist mines in 1968, he couldn't risk making any allusions in his letters, as they were obviously intercepted by the censorship.
resps: Thus, he wrote in English, to the man who brought him the food he desperately needed, and who became his lifelong friend, the only person who really knew him, a letter of unbelievable simplicity and humanity. It is a gift, a letter of unbelievable simplicity and humanity. I translated it into Romanian, in my own way, that is, into a language I can understand and use in my own life.

But he could do a poem in Romanian - a language that the censors didn't know well. The poem was discovered 30 years later when the communist censorship files were opened. Here it is in English translation:

But he kept in touch with his friends, and he managed to communicate with them with the help of a code, according to which the name of any person, town or book title had a hidden meaning. For instance, the name "Cioran" would mean "I am going to die" in Romanian.

translation.en: I think that Mircea Handoca was trying to emphasize that the tone of the letters sent by Radu Gyr was one of respect, admiration and affection without any doubt regarding the ascendancy of Eliade.
translation.ro: Ceea ce cred că voia să sublinieze Mircea Handoca e faptul că tonul acestor scrisori trimise de Radu Gyr era unul respectuos, de admirație și afecțiune fără vreo urmă de îndoială asupra ascendenței lui Eliade.

translation.en: There is really no suggestion that Radu Gyr would have ever been the superior of Eliade.
translation.ro: Nu există într-adevăr nici cea mai palidă sugestie că, vreodată, Radu Gyr i-ar fi fost șef lui Eliade.

target: Nu există într-adevăr nici cea mai palidă sugestie că, vreodată, Radu Gyr i-ar fi fost șef lui Eliade.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: There is really no suggestion that Radu Gyr would have ever been the superior of Eliade.
resps: Gyr was a professor, and Eliade was a student. Gyr was 19 years older than Eliade. Gyr was also – in the 1930s – at the height of his powers, and he would go on to become an important cultural figure in Romania. Eliade, on the other hand, was just beginning his career. In 1933 he was still a student, albeit a very talented one. In 1934 he was a junior professor, and in 1935 he was a full professor, but he remained in the shadow of Gyr. In 1936 he was promoted to the rank of associate professor, and in 1937 he became a full professor, but still he was not Gyr's superior. In 1938 he was made a full professor, but he was still not Gyr's superior. In 1939 he was made a full professor, and in 1940 he was made a full professor, but he was still not Gyr's superior. In 1941 he was made a full professor, and in 1942 he was made a full

It was Ionescu who held the superior position in the patriarchate, and it was Ionescu who was the one to promote Radu Gyr to the position of advisor to the patriarchate, which was a position of great importance and which was often the position occupied by theologians and scholars. So it is quite possible that Eliade and Radu Gyr may have met in the context of Ionescu's work at the patriarchate, but they were not equals, and it is highly unlikely that Eliade would have regarded Radu Gyr as his superior.
bleu: Nu există într-adevăr nici cea mai palidă sugestie că, vreodată, Radu Gyr i-ar fi fost șef lui Eliade.

translation.en: Being smart, the poet who was forced to write for Glasul Patriei (The voice of the Motherland), unveils from the outset his embarrassment by signalling Eliade (who knew exactly what the mission of that publication was and was constantly denigrating the exile of people with liberal ideas) in his signature, after the writing "your old friend ", telling him about what to expect. He is visibly relieved and happy when his friend responds affectionately after almost three decades of being apart, when the "cunning time" has alienated them.
translation.ro: Inteligent, poetul obligat să scrie la Glasul Patriei, își devoalează din capul locului condiția stânjenitoare semnalându-i lui Eliade (care știa foarte exact ce misiune avea publicația respectivă care se ocupase constant cu denigrarea exilului de dreapta), în semnătură, după "vechiul tău prieten", la ce să se aștepte și este vizibil ușurat și fericit când acesta îi răspunde afectuos după aproape trei decenii de despărțire de când "vicleanul timp" i-a înstrăinat.

target: Inteligent, poetul obligat să scrie la Glasul Patriei, își devoalează din capul locului condiția stânjenitoare semnalându-i lui Eliade (care știa foarte exact ce misiune avea publicația respectivă care se ocupase constant cu denigrarea exilului de dreapta), în semnătură, după "vechiul tău prieten", la ce să se aștepte și este vizibil ușurat și fericit când acesta îi răspunde afectuos după aproape trei decenii de despărțire de când "vicleanul timp" i-a înstrăinat.

He is visibly relieved and happy when his friend responds affectionately after almost three decades of being apart, when the "cunning time" has alienated them.
resps: Matei Calinescu's letter ends with the wish to meet again.
In the end, he will find again the old friend he had in Bucharest, the one who was always inclined to love and respond to the "human voice".

He also regrets that he didn’t have better news to share with Eliade about his family in Romania, as they have been through difficult times, and he hopes to be able to help and support them at least in the future.
The poet has now the occasion to disclose his thoughts and to tell Eliade about the feelings of his writing in the most influential newspaper of that time in Romania.
filtered_resps: Matei Calinescu's letter ends with the wish to meet again.
bleu: Matei Calinescu's letter ends with the wish to meet again.

translation.en: There is no doubt that, beyond the "mission" he was tasked with (to persuade Eliade that now he could easily return to the new Romania at least to see his mother and friends) which he skilfully fulfills in a cold manner and in short sentences, delimited in paragraphs to suggest their foreign body character, Radu Gyr only shows his interest in literature.
translation.ro: Nu există nici o îndoială asupra faptului că, dincolo de "misiunea" cu care fusese însărcinat (să-l convingă pe Eliade că acum, în noua Românie, ar putea reveni liniștit măcar pentru a-și revedea mama și prietenii) și pe care, abil, o îndeplinește sec și prin propoziții scurte, departajate de paragrafe, pentru a sugera caracterul lor de corp străin, Radu Gyr nu-și arată interesul decât pentru literatură.

resps: He talks about Eliade's literary work, with which he is familiar, and about Eliade's translations, of which he knows he is still unfamiliar.

It is a real pity that the young poet is not interested in the topics that concern him, while the writer, who is used to a concrete world, is not interested in the abstract worlds that the young poet is building. However, if we try to put ourselves in the shoes of the young poet, we understand that he has a moral obligation and that the writer is a kind of "enemy" or "traitor".

He asks Eliade if he continues to write in Romanian, or if he has changed his literary style. The answers (Eliade's answers) are vague. They are always the same: "It depends on how you define the style". It is obvious that the young poet (he is 25 years old) wants to learn from the older one (Eliade was 37). However, the "combat" is not entirely one-sided. Eliade also learns from Radu Gyr. He finds out that the young poet has written a book on "the aesthetics of the song". He immediately shows interest in it. He asks if the book has been published, if it had been reviewed in the press, if it is widely known. He also asks if the author is a poet. He is told that the author is a poet, so he asks if he has written any poetry books. The answer is that he has indeed written a book of poetry, whose title is "Eternal Song". translation.en: There were no question of esoteric allusions, exquisitely suggested political complications or any evocation of the youth years other than in a cultural manner.
translation.ro: Nici vorbă de aluzii ezoterice, de complicități politice rafinat sugerate sau de vreo evocare a anilor tinereții în alt registru decât cel cultural.

translation.en: It's hard to believe that Radu Gyr was the legionnaire superior of Eliade, but until this version is strengthen with less circumstantial evidence like that offered by Florin Țurcanu, this correspondence shows shards of memory which testify a mutual appreciation between characters who left their different but constant marks on our culture and, beyond the terrible trials of their lives, found the spirit of the interwar civilization and education.
translation.ro: E greu de crezut că Radu Gyr ar fi fost superior pe linie legionară lui Eliade, dar până la consolidarea acestei versiuni cu dovezi mai puțin circumstanțiale decât cele oferite de Florin Țurcanu, avem în această corespondenți cioburi de memorie care mărturisesc o prețuire reciprocă a unor personaje care au marcat diferit, dar statornic, cultura noastră și care, dincolo de încercările cumplite ale vieții, regăsesc tonul civilizației și educației interbelice.

User 0: Radu Gyr was much more than the legionnaire superior of Eliade, he was his professor of Romanian literature. This is not circumstantial evidence. In the letters, Eliade records his indebtedness to Gyr.
User 1: The only reference to that in the text is: "Dear Professor Gyr, I think that you have not forgotten our common past although you have not been in touch with me for a long time, even though I have written to you from time to time. But you know that I have never forgotten you, as you are one of the few professors who have deeply influenced my way of thinking and my attitude towards life." There is no other reference to the fact that he was his professor of Romanian literature or that he was his "legionnaire superior". I think it is circumstantial evidence because it is based on the assumption that Radu Gyr could not be anything other than the one mentioned in the above quote.

translation.en: In the early 70s, Eliade finally gives up his refugee status and obtains US citizenship and under the pretext offered by health problems and the catastrophic flooding in the country, announces the Socialist Republic of Romania authorities, through the embassy (with which he had a sporadic correspondence in order to get a passport for his sister) that he cannot accept the invitation to return to the country.
translation.ro: La începutul anilor '70, Eliade renunță finalmente la statutul de refugiat obținînd cetățenia americană și, sub pretextul oferit de problemele de sănătate și de catastrofalele inundații din țară, anunță autoritățile din RSR, prin intermediul ambasadei (cu care purta o corespondență sporadică folosită pentru a obține pașaport pentru sora sa), că nu poate da curs invitației de a reveni în țară.

target: La începutul anilor '70, Eliade renunță finalmente la statutul de refugiat obținînd cetățenia americană și, sub pretextul oferit de problemele de sănătate și de catastrofalele inundații din țară, anunță autoritățile din RSR, prin intermediul ambasadei (cu care purta o corespondență sporadică folosită pentru a obține pașaport pentru sora sa), că nu poate da curs invitației de a reveni în țară.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In the early 70s, Eliade finally gives up his refugee status and obtains US citizenship and under the pretext offered by health problems and the catastrophic flooding in the country, announces the Socialist Republic of Romania authorities, through the embassy (with which he had a sporadic correspondence in order to get a passport for his sister) that he cannot accept the invitation to return to the country.
resps: He also adds that he cannot visit Romania until the communist regime changes, which will only happen when “the current generation of leaders will disappear”, and announces that until then, his work will be forbidden in his country of origin.
bleu: La începutul anilor '70, Eliade renunță finalmente la statutul de refugiat obținînd cetățenia americană și, sub pretextul oferit de problemele de sănătate și de catastrofalele inundații din țară, anunță autoritățile din RSR, prin intermediul ambasadei (cu care purta o corespondență sporadică folosită pentru a obține pașaport pentru sora sa), că nu poate da curs invitației de a reveni în țară.

translation.en: The result was predictable: he once again indexed, the "Toladot business" is carried out in Israel, the books sent to his family and friends (Fragments d'un journal, Gallimard, 1973) are ceased by the censorship and he never sees his mother again.
translation.ro: Urmarea era previzibilă: este din nou pus la index, se montează în Israel "afacerea Toladot", cărțile trimise familiei și prietenilor (Fragments d'un journal, Gallimard, 1973) îi sunt oprite de cenzură, nu își mai revede niciodată mama.

translation.en: Among all his friends who remained in the country, he only sporadically writes to Noica, although, as evidenced by the Chicago personal archive, surprisingly many individuals or Romanian institutions manage to send him messages.
translation.ro: Dintre prietenii din țară doar cu Noica mai are o corespondență sporadică deși, în mod surprinzător, așa cum o atestă arhiva personală de la Chicago, o mulțime de persoane particulare sau instituții românești mai reușesc să îi trimită mesaje.

target: Dintre prietenii din țară doar cu Noica mai are o corespondență sporadică deși, în mod surprinzător, așa cum o atestă arhiva personală de la Chicago, o mulțime de persoane particulare sau instituții românești mai reușesc să îi trimită mesaje.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Among all his friends who remained in the country, he only sporadically writes to Noica, although, as evidenced by the Chicago personal archive, surprisingly many individuals or Romanian institutions manage to send him messages.
resps: For a while, the correspondence was regular with Anca Mizra and her husband, George Mizra. This couple, for whom he had a special affection, was exiled to Israel and then to the United States. He also corresponded, among others, with the following:

translation.en: Demoted from the women's volleyball A1 Division in the first half of the year, Penicilina Iasi retained its place in the first division due to the disbandment of Stiinta Miroslava, freshly promoted to the first division after a disputed qualification tournament which took place in the town of Iasi county.
translation.ro: Retrogradată în prima jumătate a anului din Divizia A1 de volei feminin, Penicilina Iași și-a păstrat locul în primul eșalon datorită retragerii și apoi desființării formației Știința Miroslava, proaspăt promovată în primul eșalon în urma unui turneu de baraj disputat chiar în comuna ieșeană.

target: Retrogradată în prima jumătate a anului din Divizia A1 de volei feminin, Penicilina Iași și-a păstrat locul în primul eșalon datorită retragerii și apoi desființării formației Știința Miroslava, proaspăt promovată în primul eșalon în urma unui turneu de baraj disputat chiar în comuna ieșeană.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Demoted from the women's volleyball A1 Division in the first half of the year, Penicilina Iasi retained its place in the first division due to the disbandment of Stiinta Miroslava, freshly promoted to the first division after a disputed qualification tournament which took place in the town of Iasi county.
resps: The team of Penicilina was also disqualified from the Romanian Cup due to a conflict between the club and the Romanian Volleyball Federation.
bleu: Retrogradată în prima jumătate a anului din Divizia A1 de volei feminin, Penicilina Iași și-a păstrat locul în primul eșalon datorită retragerii și apoi desființării formației Știința Miroslava, proaspăt promovată în primul eșalon în urma unui turneu de baraj disputat chiar în comuna ieșeană.

translation.en: The news took the leadership of the group from Iasi by surprise. They found themselves without a head coach (after the departure of Rares Puni, who was now a deputy coach for Stiinta Bacau) and lacking multiple player. Some of the players were retired, like Cristina Lungu and stopper Diana Studineanu, and some were transferred, like Ana-Maria Berdila (to the champion Volei Alba Blaj) and sisters Maria and Iuliana Fica.
translation.ro: Vestea a luat puțin pe nepregătite conducerea grupării ieșene, care s-a trezit rămasă fără antrenor principal (după plecarea lui Rareș Puni, ajuns secund la Știința Bacău) și multe jucătoare lipsă, unele retrase precum Cristina Lungu și liberoul Diana Studineanu, sau plecate, ca Ana-Maria Berdilă (la campioana Volei Alba Blaj) și surorile Maria și Iuliana Fică.

target: Vestea a luat puțin pe nepregătite conducerea grupării ieșene, care s-a trezit rămasă fără antrenor principal (după plecarea lui Rareș Puni, ajuns secund la Știința Bacău) și multe jucătoare lipsă, unele retrase precum Cristina Lungu și liberoul Diana Studineanu, sau plecate, ca Ana-Maria Berdilă (la campioana Volei Alba Blaj) și surorile Maria și Iuliana Fică.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The news took the leadership of the group from Iasi by surprise. They found themselves without a head coach (after the departure of Rares Puni, who was now a deputy coach for Stiinta Bacau) and lacking multiple player. Some of the players were retired, like Cristina Lungu and stopper Diana Studineanu, and some were transferred, like Ana-Maria Berdila (to the champion Volei Alba Blaj) and sisters Maria and Iuliana Fica.
resps: The team had to rely on the youth players for the upcoming season, and this will not be an easy task. Iuliana-Dana Blejan, the best youth player of 2016, has been promoted to the first team. She will have the chance to show that she is capable of filling the gap made by the departing players.
bleu: Vestea a luat puțin pe nepregătite conducerea grupării ieșene, care s-a trezit rămasă fără antrenor principal (după plecarea lui Rareș Puni, ajuns secund la Știința Bacău) și multe jucătoare lipsă, unele retrase precum Cristina Lungu și liberoul Diana Studineanu, sau plecate, ca Ana-Maria Berdilă (la campioana Volei Alba Blaj) și surorile Maria și Iuliana Fică.

translation.en: Firstly they found a new coach, Dan Gavril, who came from the men's team LPS Piatra Neamt, and had worked in recent years with Penicilina. He is going to sign a contract with the group led by Vasile Stanga.
translation.ro: Mai întâi a fost găsit un nou antrenor în persoana lui Dan Gavril, venit de la echipa masculină LPS Piatra Neamț și care a mai lucrat puțin în ultimii ani la Penicilina, acesta umând să semneze în scurt timp un contract cu gruparea condusă de Vasile Stângă.

target: Mai întâi a fost găsit un nou antrenor în persoana lui Dan Gavril, venit de la echipa masculină LPS Piatra Neamț și care a mai lucrat puțin în ultimii ani la Penicilina, acesta umând să semneze în scurt timp un contract cu gruparea condusă de Vasile Stângă.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Firstly they found a new coach, Dan Gavril, who came from the men's team LPS Piatra Neamt, and had worked in recent years with Penicilina. He is going to sign a contract with the group led by Vasile Stanga.
resps: Dan Gavril has experience in the youth categories, and is a very good technical coach.
bleu: Mai întâi a fost găsit un nou antrenor în persoana lui Dan Gavril, venit de la echipa masculină LPS Piatra Neamț și care a mai lucrat puțin în ultimii ani la Penicilina, acesta umând să semneze în scurt timp un contract cu gruparea condusă de Vasile Stângă.

translation.en: Two players from the Stiinta Miroslava, Raluca Pichiu and Tatiana Diaconita were also included in the team, and some foreign players from Bulgaria, Serbia, Montenegro and Poland were tested. The ones closest to being transferred were the Serbian player Katarina Jovanovic (from Amiens, France) and Montenegrin Jelena Cvijovic (Zrenjanin).
translation.ro: Apoi au fost aduse două jucătoare de la Știința Miroslava, Raluca Pichiu și Tatiana Diaconiță, fiind încercate și câteva jucătoare străine din Bulgaria, Serbia, Muntenegru și Polonia, mai aproape de transfer fiind jucătoarea sărbă Katarina Jovanovic (de la Amiens, Franța) și muntenegreanca Jelena Cvijovic (Zrenjanin).

target: Apoi au fost aduse două jucătoare de la Știința Miroslava, Raluca Pichiu și Tatiana Diaconiță, fiind încercate și câteva jucătoare străine din Bulgaria, Serbia, Muntenegru și Polonia, mai aproape de transfer fiind jucătoarea sărbă Katarina Jovanovic (de la Amiens, Franța) și muntenegreanca Jelena Cvijovic (Zrenjanin).
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Two players from the Stiinta Miroslava, Raluca Pichiu and Tatiana Diaconita were also included in the team, and some foreign players from Bulgaria, Serbia, Montenegro and Poland were tested. The ones closest to being transferred were the Serbian player Katarina Jovanovic (from Amiens, France) and Montenegrin Jelena Cvijovic (Zrenjanin).
resps: The team also benefited from the experience of the former Romanian international player, Roxana Hanus, who, after she had retired from playing, was appointed as a coach.
The first one was tested in the last match against Rapid, but the deal was not finalized, due to the fact that Jovanovic would not be able to join the team for the first part of the season.
bleu: Apoi au fost aduse două jucătoare de la Știința Miroslava, Raluca Pichiu și Tatiana Diaconiță, fiind încercate și câteva jucătoare străine din Bulgaria, Serbia, Muntenegru și Polonia, mai aproape de transfer fiind jucătoarea sărbă Katarina Jovanovic (de la Amiens, Franța) și muntenegreanca Jelena Cvijovic (Zrenjanin).

translation.en: Earlier this month, Penicilina led by Dan Gavril conducted a training camp in Gura Humorului, then participated in a tournament held in Lugoj whose prize was Banat Cup. The players from Iasi achieved a win (3-0 with Universitatea Cluj) but they have also suffered two losses, 0-3 with CSM Lugoj and SCMU Craiova.
translation.ro: La începutul lunii, lotul Penicilinei condus de Dan Gavril a efectuat un cantonament la Gura Humorului, după care a participat la un turneu desfășurat la Lugoj și dotat cu Cupa Banatului, în care ieșencele au realizat o victorie victorie (3-0 cu Universitatea Cluj), dar au și suferit două eșecuri, 0-3 cu CSM Lugoj și SCMU Craiova.

target: La începutul lunii, lotul Penicilinei condus de Dan Gavril a efectuat un cantonament la Gura Humorului, după care a participat la un turneu desfășurat la Lugoj și dotat cu Cupa Banatului, în care ieșencele au realizat o victorie victorie (3-0 cu Universitatea Cluj), dar au și suferit două eșecuri, 0-3 cu CSM Lugoj și SCMU Craiova.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Earlier this month, Penicilina led by Dan Gavril conducted a training camp in Gura Humorului, then participated in a tournament held in Lugoj whose prize was Banat Cup. The players from Iasi achieved a win (3-0 with Universitatea Cluj) but they have also suffered two losses, 0-3 with CSM Lugoj and SCMU Craiova.
resps: The goal of the training camp in Gura Humorului was to prepare for the next tournament scheduled in Cluj at the beginning of August. Penicilina also played a friendly match with CSM Bucuresti, which they lost 0-3.
bleu: La începutul lunii, lotul Penicilinei condus de Dan Gavril a efectuat un cantonament la Gura Humorului, după care a participat la un turneu desfășurat la Lugoj și dotat cu Cupa Banatului, în care ieșencele au realizat o victorie victorie (3-0 cu Universitatea Cluj), dar au și suferit două eșecuri, 0-3 cu CSM Lugoj și SCMU Craiova.

translation.en: We have a skilled and experienced coach, but the number of players in Romania is quite low and therefore we resort to foreign volleyball players, especially after it was decided that teams can use any number of foreign players.
translation.ro: Avem un antrenor priceput și cu experiență, dar fondul de jucătoare din România este destul de redus și de aceea vom apela și la voleibaliste din străinătate, mai ales după ce s-a luat hotărârea că echipele pot folosi un număr nelimitat de jucătoare din afara țării.

translation.en: Twins reunited after almost 70 years
translation.ro: Gemeni reuniți după aproape 70 de ani

target: Gemeni reuniți după aproape 70 de ani
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Twins reunited after almost 70 years
bleu: Gemeni reuniți după aproape 70 de ani

translation.en: The twins George Skrzynecky and Lucian Poznanski, aged 69, were born at the end of the Second World War in Germany, after their Polish mother had just been released form a labour camp.
translation.ro: Gemenii George Skrzynecky și Lucian Poznanski, în vârstă de 69 de ani, s-au născut la finele celui de-Al Doilea Război Mondial, în Germania, după ce mama lor de origine poloneză abia fusese eliberată dintr-un lagăr de muncă.

target: Gemenii George Skrzynecky și Lucian Poznanski, în vârstă de 69 de ani, s-au născut la finele celui de-Al Doilea Război Mondial, în Germania, după ce mama lor de origine poloneză abia fusese eliberată dintr-un lagăr de muncă.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The twins George Skrzynecky and Lucian Poznanski, aged 69, were born at the end of the Second World War in Germany, after their Polish mother had just been released form a labour camp.
resps: The brothers grew up in northern Germany, where the family had been expelled from Poland in 1945, at the end of the war. George and Lucian spent their childhood and teenage years in a displaced persons camp, where they also went to school. After 1959, they set off for Australia. George Skrzynecky died in Sydney in 2010, aged 60.

They were raised in a refugee camp in Germany and later in a Polish orphanage, when they were later adopted by a Romanian family from the Banat region named Gabor. They spent their childhood and adolescence in the village of Sangeorgiu de Mures, in the region of Sibiu, Transylvania.
They later moved to France, then to the US, and finally to Canada.
filtered_resps: The brothers grew up in northern Germany, where the family had been expelled from Poland in 1945, at the end of the war. George and Lucian spent their childhood and teenage years in a displaced persons camp, where they also went to school. After 1959, they set off for Australia. George Skrzynecky died in Sydney in 2010, aged 60.

George and Lucian spent their childhood and teenage years in a displaced persons camp, where they also went to school. After 1959, they set off for Australia. George Skrzynecky died in Sydney in 2010, aged 60.

translation.en: We thought that this is the moment when a violin met a guitar.
translation.ro: Ne-am gandit ca asta e momentul în care s-a intalnit o vioara cu o chitara.

target: Ne-am gandit ca asta e momentul în care s-a intalnit o vioara cu o chitara.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: We thought that this is the moment when a violin met a guitar.
resps: The two instruments were not friends, but they did not fight. They just played together. The violin played a part that was melancholic and sweet, while the guitar played a part that was cheerful and full of energy. The guitar played chords and the violin played melodies. They complemented each other and together they created a beautiful harmony.
bleu: Ne-am gandit ca asta e momentul în care s-a intalnit o vioara cu o chitara.

arguments: translate English to Romanian: One of the assurances given by the municipality at least twice in recent weeks, was the reinstatement of the roundabout from the International Railway Station area.
bleu: Una din asigurările pe care le-a dat municipalitatea, de cel puțin două ori în ultimele săptămâni, a constat în reînființarea girației din zona Gării Internaționale.

translation.en: Although only a few interim elements had to be installed and the last deadline for the performance of the works was the past weekend, the roundabout was inexistent yesterday.
translation.ro: Cu toate că trebuiau montate doar câteva elemente provizorii, iar ultimul termen de efectuare a lucrărilor era sfârșitul săptămânii trecute, ieri girația nu era realizată.

target: Cu toate că trebuiau montate doar câteva elemente provizorii, iar ultimul termen de efectuare a lucrărilor era sfârșitul săptămânii trecute, ieri girația nu era realizată.

translation.en: The drivers nerves were stretched to the maximum on Nicolae Iorga and Cantemir streets, given that another promise of the City Hall was broken: the transfer of the customs service from Nicolae Iorga Street to Tehnopolis "no later than the end of August", although this transfer is discussed since 2012.
translation.ro: Nervii șoferilor au fost întinși la maximum pe Nicolae Iorga și Cantemir, având în vedere că și o altă promisiune a Primăriei a fost încălcată: mutarea activității vamale de pe Nicolae Iorga la Tehnopolis "cel târziu până la sfârșitul lunii august", în contextul în care despre acest transfer se discută încă din 2012.

target: Nervii șoferilor au fost întinși la maximum pe Nicolae Iorga și Cantemir, având în vedere că și o altă promisiune a Primăriei a fost încălcată: mutarea activității vamale de pe Nicolae Iorga la Tehnopolis "cel târziu până la sfârșitul lunii august", în contextul în care despre acest transfer se discută încă din 2012.

resps: As the building is under the administration of the Romanian state through the Ministry of Transportation, the municipality asked the the ministry to find a solution for the disgraceful state of the park. The municipality made an offer to take over the administration of the park and to invest the necessary money for its modernization, but the Ministry of Transportation rejected it because they say that they have a project to modernize the park and they will start the works in a short period of time.
He says that the authorities will have to use other solutions.

translation.ro: Una din soluții, potrivit acestuia, ar fi oprirea tramvaiului cu un semafor înainte de girație.

target: Una din soluții, potrivit acestuia, ar fi oprirea tramvaiului cu un semafor înainte de girație.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: One solution, according to him, would be stopping the tram with a traffic light stop before the turn.
resps: This would ensure that the driver has a clear view of the turn.

translation.en: In that case, there are two projects which complement the initial one.
translation.ro: Acolo sunt două proiecte care îl completează pe cel inițial.

target: Acolo sunt două proiecte care îl completează pe cel inițial.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: In that case, there are two projects which complement the initial one.
resps: The first is called Translate English to Romanian. The second project is called Romanian Translation from English.

AMT is providing language support for the project by means of a web-based language platform, and the Romanian Association for Information Security Assurance (RAISA) is providing technical support for the project.

The first project is a dictionary, which covers 27,000 words and translates English into Romanian, but also the other way around. The second project is a grammar and style guide, which is a 14,000-word document filled with advice and instructions on how to write.

The first is an online dictionary that has a simple interface, which can translate words one by one from English to Romanian and vice versa. The second is a rather complex and large project, the online Romanian Translation Tool, which can translate entire sentences and even entire pages from English to Romanian and the other way around.
filtered_resps: The first is called Translate English to Romanian. The second project is called Romanian Translation from English.
bleu: The first is called Translate English to Romanian. The second project is called Romanian Translation from English.

translation.en: Yesterday, people from Iasi reported traffic problems especially in areas like Pacurari, Center (Targu Cucu, Independenței, Armenian Street) or the intersection of Base 3.

resps: The authorities have taken measures: they have diverted traffic, sent cars to repair the holes in the asphalt and have asked people to drive carefully.

translation.en: The Court Judges will decide tomorrow whether the legal restrictions pending trial and prohibitions of the suspended President of the County Council will be maintained.
translation.ro: Judecătorii Tribunalului vor decide mâine dacă președintelui suspendat al Consiliului Județean i se vor menține controlul judiciar și interdicțiile.

translation.en: The Magistrates of Iasi Court settled yesterday a new hearing in the "Album" case in which the suspended President of Iasi County Council is also a party.
translation.ro: Magistrații Tribunalului Iași au soluționat ieri un nou termen în dosarul "Albumul", în care inculpat este și președintele suspendat al Consiliului Județean Iași.

translation.en: At the end of yesterday's hearing, the magistrates decided to give their resolution sometime tomorrow on the measure of the judicial review currently imposed against Adomniței.
translation.ro: La finele ședinței de ieri, magistrații au stabilit să se pronunțe în cursul zilei de mâine cu privire la măsura controlului judiciar impusă în prezent împotriva lui Adomniței.

translation.en: The latter wants the substitution or revocation of this measure, which has kept him away from the seat of head of the County Council for several months.

translation.en: In case of a favourable solution and if it will be maintained by the superior court, Cristian Adomniței may resume his position as the president of the County Council.
translation.ro: În cazul unei soluții favorabile, și dacă aceasta va fi menți­nută și de instanța superioară, Cristian Adomniței își va putea relua funcția de președinte al CJ.

translation.en: Adomniței was indicted by the National Anticorruption Directorate (DNA), being accused of favouring the offender and forgery after, according to the prosecutors, he tried to mask an audit which discovered a number of irregularities regarding the acceptance of a public contract entered into by the County Council and the company Laser Co.
translation.ro: Adomniței a fost trimis în judecată de Direcția Națională Antico­rupție (DNA), fiind acuzat de favorizarea făptuitorului și fals intelectual după ce, spun pro­curorii, ar fi încercat să mascheze un control de audit în urma căruia se descoperise o serie de nereguli cu privire la recepția dintr-un contranct public semnat între CJ și firma Laser Co.

target: Adomniței a fost trimis în judecată de Direcția Națională Antico­rupție (DNA), fiind acuzat de favorizarea făptuitorului și fals intelectual după ce, spun pro­curorii, ar fi încercat să mascheze un control de audit în urma căruia se descoperise o serie de nereguli cu privire la recepția dintr-un contranct public semnat între CJ și firma Laser Co.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Adomniței was indicted by the National Anticorruption Directorate (DNA), being accused of favouring the offender and forgery after, according to the prosecutors, he tried to mask an audit which discovered a number of irregularities regarding the acceptance of a public contract entered into by the County Council and the company Laser Co.
resps: According to the same DNA data, Adomniței also tried to capitalize on the results of the audit through a company he owns, called Adom Consulting. The defendant is being accused of forgery for the fact that he faked the signature of the County Council's president, according to DNA.
filtered_resps: According to the same DNA data, Adomniței also tried to capitalize on the results of the audit through a company he owns, called Adom Consulting. The defendant is being accused of forgery for the fact that he faked the signature of the County Council's president, according to DNA.

translation.en: Adomniței allegedly tried to hide the fact that the institution he managed had not accepted more materials to promote the Iasi county, although the records shows that these materials have been received by the County Council.

arguments: translate English to Romanian: Adomniței allegedly tried to hide the fact that the institution he managed had not accepted more materials to promote the Iasi county, although the records shows that these materials have been received by the County Council.
resps: He did not make any mention about these materials in the annual reports, nor did he present them in public in front of the County Council.
bleu: Adomniței ar fi încercat să ascundă faptul că instituția pe care a condus-o nu ar fi recepționat mai multe materiale de promovare a județului Iași, deși scriptic aceste materiale figurau ca fiind primite de CJ.

translation.en: According to municipal officials, 8,500 of the 12,000 questionnaires distributed to district centres and three additional points in the city (Copou Park, Alexandru cel Bun Esplanade and the City Hall) have been filled out to date.
translation.ro: Potrivit oficialilor municipalității, până în prezent au fost completate circa 8.500 din cele 12.000 de chestionare distribuite la centrele de cartier și în alte trei puncte suplimentare din oraș (parcul Copou, esplanada Alexandru cel Bun și Primărie).

target: Potrivit oficialilor municipalității, până în prezent au fost completate circa 8.500 din cele 12.000 de chestionare distribuite la centrele de cartier și în alte trei puncte suplimentare din oraș (parcul Copou, esplanada Alexandru cel Bun și Primărie).
arguments: translate English to Romanian: According to municipal officials, 8,500 of the 12,000 questionnaires distributed to district centres and three additional points in the city (Copou Park, Alexandru cel Bun Esplanade and the City Hall) have been filled out to date.
resps: The administration would like to reach as many people as possible through this process, and the questionnaires will be available until the end of the month.
The questionnaires, which were developed by the town hall in collaboration with the European Commission, will be collected until the end of the month and then sent to Brussels for processing.
bleu: Potrivit oficialilor municipalității, până în prezent au fost completate circa 8.500 din cele 12.000 de chestionare distribuite la centrele de cartier și în alte trei puncte suplimentare din oraș (parcul Copou, esplanada Alexandru cel Bun și Primărie).

translation.en: A record number of Iasi citizens came Sunday in front of the City Hall.
translation.ro: Un număr record de ieșeni s-a prezentat duminică în fața Primăriei.

target: Un număr record de ieșeni s-a prezentat duminică în fața Primăriei.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: A record number of Iasi citizens came Sunday in front of the City Hall.
resps: Romanian version: Un număr record de cetățeni din Iași au venit duminică în fața Primăriei.
bleu: Un număr record de ieșeni s-a prezentat duminică în fața Primăriei.

translation.en: According to the representatives of the civic group "Iași loves linden trees", 530 Iasi citizens voted in 140 minutes or almost four votes each minute.
translation.ro: Conform reprezentanților grupului civic "Iașul iubește teii", 530 de ieșeni au votat în 140 de minute, respectiv aproape patru voturi exprimate în fiecare minut.

target: Conform reprezentanților grupului civic "Iașul iubește teii", 530 de ieșeni au votat în 140 de minute, respectiv aproape patru voturi exprimate în fiecare minut.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: According to the representatives of the civic group "Iași loves linden trees", 530 Iasi citizens voted in 140 minutes or almost four votes each minute.
resps: The civic group says that the Iasi City Hall did not provide all necessary information in the referendum campaign. Iași loves linden trees representatives have claimed that a new road in Iasi will destroy a number of 107 linden trees and that the city hall has lied to citizens as the trees were not sick as the local authorities had said, according to the representatives of the civic group.
This shows the commitment and interest of Iași citizens towards the future of the city, but also towards the preservation of the identity and history of the city.

Conform reprezentanților grupului civic "Iașul iubește teii", 530 de ieșeni au votat în 140 de minute, respectiv aproape patru voturi exprimate în fiecare minut.

translation.en: Instead, throughout Monday, about 440 Iasi citizens came in the same place.
translation.ro: În schimb, pe tot parcursul zilei de luni, în același loc au venit aproximativ 440 de ieșeni.

resps: More than a thousand people are expected during the three days of the fair.
bleu: În schimb, pe tot parcursul zilei de luni, în același loc au venit aproximativ 440 de ieșeni.

translation.en: Group volunteers say that many Iasi citizens criticise the inefficient advertising and popularization of public consultation.
translation.ro: Voluntarii grupului spun că mulți ieșeni reclamă semnalizarea și popula­ri­zarea ineficiente ale consultării publice.

target: Voluntarii grupului spun că mulți ieșeni reclamă semnalizarea și popula­ri­zarea ineficiente ale consultării publice.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Group volunteers say that many Iasi citizens criticise the inefficient advertising and popularization of public consultation.

bleu: Voluntarii grupului spun că mulți ieșeni reclamă semnalizarea și popula­ri­zarea ineficiente ale consultării publice.

translation.en: Therefore, they called yesterday to internet users to print an information poster provided by the group and stick it on building entrances.
translation.ro: Prin urmare, aceștia au făcut un apel ieri la utilizatorii de internet să tipărească un afiș de informare pus la dispoziție de grup și să-l lipească în scările de bloc.

target: Prin urmare, aceștia au făcut un apel ieri la utilizatorii de internet să tipărească un afiș de informare pus la dispoziție de grup și să-l lipească în scările de bloc.

translation.en: Volunteers also said that at the additional point in Copou park, the last forms were filled out by the people of Iasi on Sunday.
translation.ro: De asemenea, voluntarii au arătat că la punctul suplimentar din parcul Copou ultimele formulare au fost completate de ieșeni duminică.

translation.en: "We will make further additions when all 12,000 forms will be filled out," the municipality spokesman Sebastian Buraga said yesterday.
translation.ro: "Eventuale suplimentări vom face atunci când toate cele 12.000 de formulare vor fi completate", a declarat ieri purtătorul de cuvânt al municipalității, Sebastian Buraga.

translation.en: "The Linden Survey" will end on September 25, and if the majority of the people of Iasi's vote is in favour of replanting the trees then the City Hall will plant silver lindens this fall.
translation.ro: "Scruti­nul teilor" se va încheia pe 25 septembrie, iar dacă votul majoritar al ieșenilor este în favoarea replantării copacilor atunci Primăria va planta tei argintii în această toamnă.

target: "Scruti­nul teilor" se va încheia pe 25 septembrie, iar dacă votul majoritar al ieșenilor este în favoarea replantării copacilor atunci Primăria va planta tei argintii în această toamnă.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: "The Linden Survey" will end on September 25, and if the majority of the people of Iasi's vote is in favour of replanting the trees then the City Hall will plant silver lindens this fall.
resps: Thank you for your collaboration!

translation.en: The people from Iasi may express their opinion in the district centres of Dacia, Frumoasa, Tătărași, Nicolina and Păcurari, as well as in the additional points mentioned above.
translation.ro: Ieșenii își pot exprima opinia la centrele de cartier din Dacia, Frumoasa, Tătărași, Nicolina și Păcurari, precum și în punctele suplimentare menționate mai sus.

translation.en: The Heads of The City Hall decided the cutting of linden trees on Stefan cel Mare Street in early 2013, an action that resulted in a fine of 60,000 lei for the municipality.
translation.ro: Șefii Primăriei au decis tăierea teilor de pe Ștefan cel Mare la începutul anului 2013, acțiune care a atras o amendă de 60.000 lei municipalității.

target: Șefii Primăriei au decis tăierea teilor de pe Ștefan cel Mare la începutul anului 2013, acțiune care a atras o amendă de 60.000 lei municipalității.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Heads of The City Hall decided the cutting of linden trees on Stefan cel Mare Street in early 2013, an action that resulted in a fine of 60,000 lei for the municipality.
resps: The Romanian translation would be: Primarul și Consiliul Local au hotărât tăierea arborilor de tili pe strada Stefan cel Mare la începutul anului 2013, o acțiune care a dus la o amendă de 60.000 de lei pentru municipiu.
bleu: Șefii Primăriei au decis tăierea teilor de pe Ștefan cel Mare la începutul anului 2013, acțiune care a atras o amendă de 60.000 lei municipalității.

translation.en: The decision was taken unilaterally, without consultation with the population, and led to the spontaneous establishment of the civic group "Iași loves linden trees", an online community comprising approximately 13,500 people.
translation.ro: Decizia a fost adoptată unilateral, fără o consultare a populației, și a dus la apariția spontană a grupului civic "Iașul iubește teii", o comunitate online care cuprinde circa 13.500 de persoane.

target: Decizia a fost adoptată unilateral, fără o consultare a populației, și a dus la apariția spontană a grupului civic "Iașul iubește teii", o comunitate online care cuprinde circa 13.500 de persoane.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The decision was taken unilaterally, without consultation with the population, and led to the spontaneous establishment of the civic group "Iași loves linden trees", an online community comprising approximately 13,500 people.
resps: The name of the group was later changed to "Iași loves green spaces", due to the expansion of its areas of interest.

The group intends to mobilise the population to fight against the felling of the linden trees. The judicial decision is illegal and unconstitutional, and in order to protest against the decision, the group calls for a demonstration that will take place in the city's main square on 13 April.
bleu: Decizia a fost adoptată unilateral, fără o consultare a populației, și a dus la apariția spontană a grupului civic "Iașul iubește teii", o comunitate online care cuprinde circa 13.500 de persoane.

translation.en: Online, a petition initiated by the civic group for the replanting of linden trees was signed, until yesterday evening, by over 9,100 supporters.
translation.ro: În mediul virtual, o petiție inițiată de grupul civic pentru replantarea teilor era semnată, până ieri seară, de peste 9.100 de susținători.

target: În mediul virtual, o petiție inițiată de grupul civic pentru replantarea teilor era semnată, până ieri seară, de peste 9.100 de susținători.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: Online, a petition initiated by the civic group for the replanting of linden trees was signed, until yesterday evening, by over 9,100 supporters.
resps: This is the civic platform's latest project.

The civic group's purpose is to urge the Bucharest City Hall to replant the linden trees that have recently been cut down from the Kiseleff Boulevard, a project that is expected to be completed by the end of the year.
bleu: În mediul virtual, o petiție inițiată de grupul civic pentru replantarea teilor era semnată, până ieri seară, de peste 9.100 de susținători.

translation.en: The university has 920 students enrolled in the first year.
translation.ro: Universitatea are în acest an 920 de studenți în anul I.

target: Universitatea are în acest an 920 de studenți în anul I.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The university has 920 students enrolled in the first year.
bleu: Universitatea are în acest an 920 de studenți în anul I.

translation.en: The Representatives of the University of Agricultural Sciences and Veterinary Medicine "Ion Ionescu de la Brad" (USAMV) stated that this year were admitted more candidates than ever before in the history of the institution of higher education, since its establishment.
translation.ro: Reprezentanții Universității de Științie Agricole și Medicină Veterinară "Ion Ionescu de la Brad" au precizat că anul acesta au fost cei mai mulți candidați admiși vreodată, din istoria instituției de învățământ superior, de la înființare.

target: Reprezentanții Universității de Științie Agricole și Medicină Veterinară "Ion Ionescu de la Brad" au precizat că anul acesta au fost cei mai mulți candidați admiși vreodată, din istoria instituției de învățământ superior, de la înființare.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: The Representatives of the University of Agricultural Sciences and Veterinary Medicine "Ion Ionescu de la Brad" (USAMV) stated that this year were admitted more candidates than ever before in the history of the institution of higher education, since its establishment.
resps: The number of admitted students, in the first year of undergraduate studies, this year is 1.800.
bleu: Reprezentanții Universității de Științie Agricole și Medicină Veterinară "Ion Ionescu de la Brad" au precizat că anul acesta au fost cei mai mulți candidați admiși vreodată, din istoria instituției de învățământ superior, de la înființare.

translation.en: We are very pleased with the results of this year's admission.
translation.ro: Suntem foarte mulțumiți de rezultatele de anul acest de la admitere.

target: Suntem foarte mulțumiți de rezultatele de anul acest de la admitere.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: We are very pleased with the results of this year's admission.
bleu: Suntem foarte mulțumiți de rezultatele de anul acest de la admitere.

translation.en: We have the largest number of candidates ever admitted in the university's history, nearly 920 students in the first year. We have never reached such a number.
translation.ro: Avem cel mai mare număr de candidați admiși din istoria universității, aproape 920 de studenți în anul I. Niciodată nu am depășit un asemenea număr.

target: Avem cel mai mare număr de candidați admiși din istoria universității, aproape 920 de studenți în anul I. Niciodată nu am depășit un asemenea număr.
arguments: translate English to Romanian: We have the largest number of candidates ever admitted in the university's history, nearly 920 students in the first year. We have never reached such a number.
bleu: Avem cel mai mare număr de candidați admiși din istoria universității, aproape 920 de studenți în anul I. Niciodată nu am depășit un asemenea număr.

translation.en: "We also had candidates with higher average marks and we filled our scholarships for the Bachelor's and Master's programs" said Prof. Ioan Țenu, vice-rector in charge of teaching.
translation.ro: "Am avut și candidați cu medii mai mari, ne-am ocupat locurile de la buget la licență și master", a declarat prof.dr. Ioan Țenu, prorector responsabil cu activitatea didactică.

target: "Am avut și candidați cu medii mai mari, ne-am ocupat locurile de la buget la licență și master", a declarat prof.dr. Ioan Țenu, prorector responsabil cu activitatea didactică.

translation.en: He also said that the university has registered a considerable number of paying students, occupying 20% of its seats, a figure significantly higher than in other years.
translation.ro: Acesta a mai precizat că universitatea a înmatriculat și un număr considerabil de studenți la taxă, ocupând 20% din locurile respective, o cifră semnificativ mai mare decât în alți ani.

target: Acesta a mai precizat că universitatea a înmatriculat și un număr considerabil de studenți la taxă, ocupând 20% din locurile respective, o cifră semnificativ mai mare decât în alți ani.
